    imāṃścāpyaparān svapnān dāruṇānupalakṣayet/
    vyādhitānāṃ vināśāya kleśāya mahate+api vā//
    yasyottamāṅge jāyante vaṃśagulmalatādayaḥ/
    vayāṃsi ca vilīyante svapne maiṇḍyamiyācca yaḥ//
    gṛdhrolūkaśvakākādyaiḥ svapne yaḥ parivāryate/
    rakṣaḥpretapiśācastrīcaṇḍāla-&draviḍāndhrakaiḥ//
    vaṃśavetralatāpāśatṛṇakaṇṭakasaṅkaṭe/
    &saṃsajjati hi yaḥ svapne yo &gacchan prapatatyapi//
    bhūmau pāṃśūpadhānāyāṃ valmīke vā+atha bhasmani/
    śmaśānāyatane śvabhre svapne yaḥ &prapatatyapi//
    kaluṣe+ambhasi paṅke vā kūpe vā tamasā++āvṛte/
    svapne majjati śīghreṇa srotasā &hriyate ca yaḥ//
    snehapānaṃ tathā+abhyaṅgaḥ pracchardanavirecane/
    hiraṇyalābhaḥ kalahaḥ svapne bandhaparājayau//
    upānadyuganāśaśca prapātaḥ pādacarmaṇoḥ/
    harṣaḥ svapne prakupitaiḥ pitṛbhiścāvabhartsanam//
    danta-&candrārkanakṣatradevatādīpacakṣuṣām/
    patanaṃ vā vināśo vā svapne bhedo nagasya vā//
    raktapuṣpaṃ vanaṃ bhūmiṃ pāpakarmālayaṃ citām/
    guhāndhakārasaṃbādhaṃ svapne yaḥ praviśatyapi//
    raktamālī hasannuccairdigvāsā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam/
    dāruṇāmaṭavīṃ svapne kapiyuktena yāti vā//
    kāṣāyiṇāmasaumyānāṃ nagnānāṃ daṇḍadhāriṇām/
    kṛṣṇānāṃ raktanetrāṇāṃ svapne necchanti daraśanam//
    kṛṣṇā &pāpā nirācārā dīrghakeśanakhastanī/
    virāgamālyavasanā svapne kālaniśā matā//
    ityete dāruṇāḥ svapnā rohī yairyāti pañcatām/
    arogaḥ saṃśayaṃ gatvā kaścideva pramucyate//
    manovahānāṃ pūrṇatvāddoṣauratibalaistribhiḥ/
    srotasāṃ dāruṇān svapnān kāle paśyati dāruṇe//
    nātiprasuptaḥ puruṣaḥ saphalānaphalāṃstathā/
    indriyeśena manasā svapnān paśyatyanekadhā//
    dṛṣṭaṃ śrutānubhūtaṃ ca prārthitaṃ kalpitaṃ tathā/
    bhāvikaṃ doṣajaṃ caiva svapnaṃ saptavidhaṃ viduḥ//
    tatra pañcavidhaṃ pūrvamaphalaṃ bhiṣagādiśet/
    divāsvapnamatihrasvamatidīrghaṃ &ca buddhimān//
    dṛṣṭaḥ prathamarātre yaḥ svapnaḥ so+&alpaphalo bhavet/
    na svapedyaṃ punardṛṣṭvā sa sadyaḥ syānmahāphalaḥ//
    akalyāṇamapi svapnaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatraiva yaḥ punaḥ/
    paśyet saumyaṃ śubhākāraṃ tasya vidyācchubhaṃ phalam//

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    pūrvarūpāṇyatha svapnān ya imān vetti dāruṇān/
    na sa mohādasādhyeṣu karmāṇyārabhate bhiṣak//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte indriyasthāne pūrvarūpīyamindriyaṃ nāma pañcamo+adhyāyaḥ//5//

    5.6. ṣaṣṭho+adhyāyaḥ/

    athātaḥ katamāniśarīrīyamindriyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    katamāni śarīrāṇi vyādhimanti mahāmune!/
    yāni vaidyaḥ pariharedyeṣu karma na siddhyati//
    &ityātreyo+agniveśena praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ sudurvacam/
    ācacakṣe yathā tasmai bhagavāṃstannibodhata//
    yasya vaibhāṣamāṇasya rujatyūrdhvamuro bhṛśam/
    annaṃ ca cyavate bhuktaṃ sthitaṃ cāpi na jīryati//
    balaṃ ca hīyate &śīghraṃ tṛṣṇā cātipravardhate/
    jāyate hṛdi śūlaṃ ca taṃ bhiṣak parivarjayet//
    hikkā gambhīrajā yasya śoṇitaṃ cātisāryate/
    na tasmai bheṣajaṃ dadyāt smarannātreyaśāsnama//
    ānāhaścātisāraśca yametau durbalaṃ naram/
    vyādhitaṃ viśato rogau durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam//
    ānāhaścātitṛṣṇā ca yametau durbalaṃ naram/
    viśato vijahatyenaṃ prāṇā nāticirānnaram//
    jvaraḥ paurvāhṇiko yasya śuṣkakāsaśca dāruṇaḥ/
    balamāṃsavihīnasya yathā pretastathaiva saḥ//
    yasya mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca grathitaṃ saṃpravartate/
    nirūṣmaṇo jaṭhariṇaḥ śvasano na sa jīvati//
    śvayathuryasya kukṣistho hastapādaṃ visarpati/
    jñātisaṅghaṃ sa saṃkleśya tena rogeṇa hanyate//
    śvayathuryasya pādasthastathā sraste ca piṇḍike/
    sīdataścāpyubhe &jaṅghe taṃ bhiṣak parivarjayet//
    śūnahastaṃ śūnapādaṃ śūnaguhyodaraṃ naram/
    hīnavarṇabalāhāramauṣadhairnopapādayet//
    &uroyukto bahuśleṣmā nīlaḥ pītaḥ salohitaḥ/
    satataṃ cyavate yasya dūrātaṃ parivarjayet//
    hṛṣṭaromā sāndramūtraḥ śūnaḥ &kāsajvarārditaḥ/
    kṣīṇamāṃso naro dūrādvarjyo vaidyena jānatā//
    trayaḥ prakupitā yasya doṣāḥ &kaṣṭābhilakṣitāḥ/
    kṛśasya balahīnasya nāsti tasya cikitsitam//
    jvarātisārau śophānte śvayathurvā tayoḥ kṣaye/
    durbalasya viśeṣeṇa narasyāntāya jāyate//
    pāṇḍuraśca kṛśo+atyarthaṃ tṛṣṇayā+abhipariplutaḥ/
    ḍambarī kupitocchvāsaḥ pratyākhyeyo vijānatā//
    hanumanyāgrahastṛṣṇā balahrāso+atimātrayā/
    prāṇāścorasi vartante yasya taṃ parivarjayet//
    &tāmyatyāyacchate śarma na kiñcidapi vindati/
    kṣīṇamāṃsabalāhāro mumūrṣuracirānnaraḥ//
    viruddhayonayo yasya viruddhopakramā bhṛśam/
    &vardhante dāruṇā rogāḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ sa hanyate//
    balaṃ vijñānamārogyaṃ grahaṇī &māṃsaśoṇitam/
    etāni yasya &kṣīyante kṣipraṃ kṣipraṃ sa hanyate//
    ārogyaṃ hīyate &yasya prakṛtiḥ parihīyate/
    sahasā sahasā tasya mṛtyurharati jīvitam//

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    ityetāni śarīrāṇi vyādhimanti vivarjayet/
    na hyeṣu dhīrāḥ paśyanti siddhiṃ kāñcidupakramāt//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte indriyasthāne katamāniśarīrīyamindriyaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho+adhyāyaḥ//6//

    5.7. saptamo+adhyāyaḥ/

    athātaḥ pannarūpīyamindriyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    dṛṣṭyāṃ yasya vijānīyāt pannarūpāṃ kumārikām/
    praticchāyāmayīmakṣṇornainamiccheccikitsitum//
    jyotsnāyāmātape dīpe salilādarśayorapi/
    aṅgeṣu vikṛtā yasya cchāyā &pretastathaiva saḥ//
    chinnā bhinnā++ākulā cchāyā hīnā vā+apyadhikā+api vā/
    naṣṭā tanvī dvidhā cchinnā vikṛtā viśitā ca yā//
    etāścānyāśca yāḥ kāścit praticchāyā vigarhitāḥ/
    sarvā mumūrṣatāṃ jñeyā na cellakṣyanimittajāḥ//
    saṃsthānena pramāṇena varṇena prabhayā tathā/
    chāyā vivartate yasya svastho+api preta eva saḥ//
    saṃsthānamākṛtirjñeyā suṣamā viṣamā ca sā/
    madhyamalpaṃ mahaccoktaṃ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ nṛṇām//
    pratipramāṇasaṃsthānā jalādarśātapādiṣu/
    chāyā yā sā praticchāyā cchāyā varṇaprabhāśrayā//
    svādīnāṃ pañca pañcānāṃ chāyā vividhalakṣaṇāḥ/
    nābhasī nirmalā nilā sasnehā saprabheva ca //
    rūkṣā śyāvāruṇā yā tu vāyavī sā hataprabhā/
    viśuddharaktā tvāgneyī dīptābhā darśanapriyā//
    śuddhavaidūryavimalā susnigdhā cāmbhasī matā/
    sthirā &snigdhā ghanā ślakṣṇā śyāmā śvetā ca pārthivī//
    vāyavī garhitā tvāsāṃ catasraḥ syuḥ &sukhodayāḥ/
    vāyavī tu vimāśāyā kleśāya mahate+api vā//
    syāttaijasī prabhā sarvā sā tu saptavidhā smṛtā/
    raktā pītā sitā śyāvā haritā pāṇḍurā+asitā//
    tāsāṃ yāḥ syurvikāsinyaḥ snigdhāśca vipulāśca yāḥ/
    tāḥ śubhā rūkṣamalināḥ &saṃkṣiptāścāśubhodayāḥ//
    varṇamākrāmati cchāyā &bhāstu varṇaprakāśinī/
    āsannā lakṣyate cchāyā bhāḥ &prakṛṣṭā prakāśate//
    nācchāyo nāprabhaḥ kaścidviśeṣāścihnayanti tu/
    nṛṇāṃ śubhāśubhotpattiṃ kāle chāyāprabhāśrayāḥ//
    kāmalā+akṣṇormukhaṃ pūrṇaṃ śaṅkhayormuktamāṃsatā/
    &saṃtrāsaścoṣṇagātratvaṃ yasya taṃ parivarjayet//
    utthāpyamānaḥ śayanāt pramohaṃ yāti yo naraḥ/
    muhurmuhurna saptāhaṃ sa jīvati &vikatthanaḥ//
    saṃsṛṣṭā vyādhayo yasya pratilomānulomagāḥ/
    vyāpannā grahaṇī prāyaḥ so+ardhamāsaṃ na jīvati//
    uparuddhasya rogeṇa karśitasyālpamaśnataḥ/
    bahu mūtrapurīṣaṃ syādyasya taṃ parivarjayet//
    durbalo bahu bhuṅkte yaḥ &prāgbhuktādannamāturaḥ/
    alpamūtrapurīṣaśca yathā pretastathaiva saḥ//
    iṣṭaṃ ca &guṇasaṃpannamannamaśnāti yo naraḥ/
    śaśvacca balavarṇābhyāṃ hīyate na sa jīvati//
    prakūjati praśvasiti śithilaṃ cātisāryate/
    balahīnaḥ pipāsārtaḥ śuṣkāsyo na sa jīvati//
    hrasvaṃ ca yaḥ praśvasiti vyāviddhaṃ spandate ca yaḥ/
    mṛtameva tamātreyo vyācacakṣe punarvasuḥ//
    ūrdhvaṃ ca yaḥ praśvasiti śleṣmaṇā cābhibhūyate/
    hīnavarṇabalāhāro yo naro na sa jīvati//
    ūrdhvāgne nayane yasya &manye cāratakampane/
    balahīnaḥ pipāsārtaḥ śuṣkāsyo na sa jīvati//
    yasya gaṇḍāvupacitau jvarakāsau ca dāruṇau/
    śūlī pradveṣṭi cāpyannaṃ tasmin karma na sidhyati//
    &vyāvṛttamūrdhajihvāsyo bhruvau yasya ca vicyute/
    kaṇṭakaiścācitā jihvā yathā pretastathaiva saḥ//
    śophaścātyarthamutsiktaṃ niḥsṛtau vṛṣaṇau bhṛśam/
    ataścaiva viparyāso vikṛtyā pretalakṣaṇam//
    nicitaṃ yasya māṃsaṃ &syāttvagasthiṣveva dṛśyate/
    kṣīṇasyānaśnatastasya māsamāyuḥ paraṃ bhavet//

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    idaṃ liṅgamariṣṭāakhyamanekamabhijajñivān/
    āyurvedavidityākhyāṃ labhate kuśalo janaḥ//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte indriyasthāne pannarūpīyamindriyaṃ nāma saptamo+adhyāyaḥ//7//

    5.8. aṣṭamo+adhyāyaḥ/

    athāto+avākśirasīyamindriyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    avākśirā vā jihmā vā yasya vā viśirā bhavet/
    janto rūpapraticchāyā nainamiccheccikitsitum//
    jaṭībhūtāni pakṣmāṇi dṛṣṭiścāpi &nigṛhyate/
    yasya jantorna taṃ dhīro bheṣajenopapādayet//
    yasya śūnāni vartmāni na samāyānti śuṣyataḥ/
    cakṣuṣī &copadihyete yathā pretastathaiva saḥ//
    bhruvorvā yadi vā mūrdhni sīmantāvartakān bahūn/
    apūrvānakṛtān vyaktān dṛṣṭvā maraṇamādiśet//
    tryahametena jīvanti lakṣaṇenāturā narāḥ/
    arogāṇāṃ punastvetat ṣaḍrātraṃ &paramucyate//
    āyamyotpāṭitān keśān yo naro nāvabudhyate/
    anāturo vā rogī vā ṣaḍrātraṃ nātivartate//
    yasya keśā nirabhyaṅgā dṛśyante+abhyaktasannibhāḥ/
    uparuddhāyuṣaṃ jñātvā taṃ dhīraḥ parivarjayet//
    &glāyate nāsikāvaṃśaḥ pṛthutvaṃ yasya gacchati/
    aśūnaḥ śūnasaṃkāśaḥ pratyākhyeyaḥ sa jānatā//
    atyarthavivṛtā yasya yasya cātyarthasaṃvṛtā/
    jihmā vā pariśuṣkā vā nāsikā na sa jīvati//
    mukhaṃ &śabdaśravāvoṣṭhau śuklaśyāvātilohitau/
    vikṛtyā yasya vā nīlau na sa rogādvimucyate//
    asthiśvetā dvijā yasya puṣpitāḥ paṅkasaṃvṛtāḥ/
    vikṛtyā na sa rogaṃ taṃ vihāyārogyamaśnute//
    stabdhā niścetanā gurvī kaṇṭakopacitā bhṛśam/
    śyāvā śuṣkā+athavā śūnā pretajihvā nisarpiṇī//
    dīrghamucchvasya yo hrasvaṃ naro niḥśvasya tāmyati/
    uparuddhāyuṣaṃ jñātvā taṃ dhīraḥ parivarjayet//
    hastau pādau ca manye ca tālu caivātidītalam/
    bhavatyāyuḥkṣaye krūramathavā+api bhavenmṛdu//
    ghaṭṭayañjānunā jānu pādāvudyamya pātayan/
    yo+apāsyati muhurvaktramāturo na sa jīvati//
    dantaiśchindannakhāgrāṇi nakhaicchindañchiroruhān/
    kāṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhanna rogāt parimucyate//
    dantān khādati yo jāgradasāmnā virudan hasan/
    vijānāti na cedduḥkhaṃ na sa rogādvimucyate//
    muhurhasan muhuḥ kṣveḍan śayyāṃ pādena hanti yaḥ/
    &uccaiśchidrāṇi vimṛśannāturo na sa jīvati//
    yairvindati purā bhāvaiḥ sametaiḥ paramāṃ ratim/
    tairevāramamāṇasya glāsnormaraṇamādiśet//
    na bibharti śiro grīvā na pṛṣṭhaṃ bhāramātmanaḥ/
    na hanū piṇḍamāsyasthamāturasya mumūrṣataḥ//
    sahasā jvarasaṃtāpastṛṣṇā mūrcchā balakṣayaḥ/
    viśleṣaṇaṃ ca sandhīnāṃ mumūrṣorupajāyate//
    gosargo vadanādyasya svedaḥ pracyavate bhṛśam/
    lepajvaropataptasya durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam//
    nopaiti kaṇṭhamāhāro jihvā kaṇṭhamupaiti ca/
    āyuṣyantaṃ gate jantorbalaṃ ca parihīyate//
    śiro vikṣipate kṛcchrānmuñcayitvā prapāṇikau/
    lalāṭasrupratasvedo &mumūrṣuścyutabandhanaḥ//

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    imāni liṅgāni nareṣu buddhimān vibhāvayetāvahito mumūrṣuṣu/
    kṣaṇena bhūtvā hyupayānti kānicinnacāphalaṃ liṅgamihāsti kiñcana//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte indriyasthāne+avākṇirasīyamindriyaṃ nāmāṣṭamo+adhyāyaḥ//8//

    5.9. navamo+adhyāyaḥ/

    athāto &yasyaśyāvanimittīyamindriyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    yasya śyāve paridhvaste harite cāpi darśane/
    āpanno vyādhirantāya jñeyastasya vijānatā//
    niḥsaṃjñaḥ pariśuṣkāsyaḥ &samṛddho vyādhibhiśca yaḥ/
    uparuddhāyuṣaṃ jñātvā taṃ dhīraḥ parivarjayet//
    &haritāśca sirā yasya lomakūpāśca saṃvṛtāḥ/
    so+amlābhilāṣī puruṣaḥ pittānmaraṇamaśnute//
    śarīrāntāśca śobhante śarīraṃ copaśuṣyati/
    balaṃ ca hīyate yasya rājayakṣmā hinasti tam//
    aṃsābhitāpo hikkā ca chardanaṃ śoṇitasya ca/
    ānāhaḥ pārśvaśūlaṃ ca bhavatyantāya śoṣiṇaḥ//
    vātavyādhirapasmārī kuṣṭhī &śophī tathodarī/
    gulmī ca madhumehī ca rājayakṣmī ca yo naraḥ//
    acikitsyā bhavantyete balamāṃsakṣaye sati/
    anyeṣvapi vikāreṣu tān bhiṣak parivarjayet//
    virecanahṛtānāho yastṛṣṇānugato naraḥ/
    viriktaḥ punarādhmāti yathā pretastathaiva saḥ//
    peyaṃ pātuṃ na śaknoti kaṇṭhasya ca mukhasya ca/
    urasaśca niśuṣkatvādyo naro na sa &jīvati//
    svarasya durbalībhāvaṃ hāniṃ ca balavarṇayoḥ/
    rogavṛddhimayuktyā ca dṛṣṭvā maraṇamādiśet//
    ūrdhvaśvāsaṃ gatoṣmāṇaṃ śūlopahatavaṅkṣaṇam/
    śarma cānadhigacchantaṃ buddhimān parivarjayet//
    apasvaraṃ bhāpamāṇaṃ prāptaṃ maraṇamātmanaḥ/
    śrotāraṃ cāpyaśabdasya dūrataḥ parivarjayet//
    yaṃ naraṃ sahasā rogo durbalaṃ parimuñcati/
    saṃśayaprāptamātreyo jīvitaṃ tasya manyate//
    atha cejjñātayastasya yāceran praṇipātataḥ/
    rasenādyāditi brūyānnāsmai dadyādviśodhanam//
    māsena cenna dṛśyeta viśeṣastasya śobhanaḥ/
    rasaiścānyaibahuvidhairdurlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam//
    niṣṭhyūtaṃ ca purīṣaṃ ca retaścāmbhasi majjati/
    yasya tasyāyuṣaḥ prāptamantamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ//
    niṣṭyūte yasya dṛśyante varṇā bahuvidhāḥ pṛthak/
    tacca sīdatyapaḥ prāpya na sa &jīvitumarhati//
    pittamūṣmānugaṃ yasya śaṅgau prāpya &vimūrcchati/
    sa rogaḥ śaṅkhako nāmnā trirātrāddhanti jīvitam//
    saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ yasya muhurāsyāt prasicyate/
    śūlaiśca tudyate kukṣiḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ//
    balamāṃsakṣayastīvro rogavṛddhirarocakaḥ/
    yasyāturasya lakṣyante trīn pakṣānna sa jīvati//

    tatra ślokau--- vijñānāni manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇe pratyupasthite/

    bhavantyetāni saṃpaśyedanyānyevaṃvidhāni ca//
    tāni sarvāṇi lakṣyante na tu sarvāṇi mānavam/
    viśanti vinaśiṣyantaṃ tasmādbodhyāni sarvataḥ//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte indriyasthāne yasyaśyāvanimittīyamindriyaṃ nāma navamo+adhyāyaḥ//9//

    5.10. daśamo+adhyāyaḥ/

    athātaḥ sadyomaraṇīyamindriyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    sadyastitikṣataḥ prāṇāṃ(anunāsika)llakṣaṇāni pṛthak pṛthak/
    agniveśa! pravakṣyāmi saṃspṛṣṭo yairna jīvati//
    vātāṣṭhīlā susaṃvṛddhā tiṣṭhantī dāruṇā hṛdi/
    tṛṣṇayā+abhiparītasya sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    piṇḍike śithilīkṛtya jihmīkṛtya ca nāsikām/
    vāyuḥ śarīre vicaran sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    bhruvau yasya cyute sthānādantardāhaśca dāruṇaḥ/
    tasya hikkākaro rogaḥ sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    kṣīṇaśoṇitamāṃsasya vāyurūrdhvagatiścaran/
    ubhe manye same yasya sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    &antareṇa gudaṃ gacchan nābhiṃ ca sahasā+anilaḥ/
    kṛśasya vaṃkṣaṇau gṛhṇan sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    vitatya parśukāgrāṇi gṛhītvoraśca mārutaḥ/
    stimitasyāyatākṣasya sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    hṛdayaṃ ca gudaṃ cobhe &gṛhītvā māruto balī/
    durbalasya viśeṣeṇa sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    vaṃkṣaṇaṃ ca gudaṃ cobhe gṛhītvā māruto balī/
    śvāsaṃ saṃjanayañjantoḥ sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    nābhiṃ mūtraṃ &bastiśīrṣaṃ purīṣaṃ cāpi mārutaḥ/
    &pracchinnaṃ janayañchūlaṃ sadyo muṣṇāti jīvitam//
    bhidyete vaṃkṣaṇau yasya vātaśūlaiḥ samantataḥ/
    bhinnaṃ purīṣaṃ tṛṣṇā ca sadyaḥ prāṇāñjahāti saḥ//
    āplutaṃ māruteneha śarīraṃ yasya kevalam/
    bhinnaṃ purīṣaṃ tṛṣṇā ca sadyo jahyāt sa jīvitam//
    śarīraṃ śophitaṃ yasya vātāśophena dehinaḥ/
    bhinnaṃ purīṣaṃ tṛṣṇā ca sadyo jahyāt sa jīvitam//
    āmāśayasamutthānā yasya syāt parikartikā/
    bhinnaṃ purīṣaṃ tṛṣṇā ca sadyaḥ prāṇāñjahāti saḥ//
    pakvāśayasamutthānā yasya syāt parikartikā/
    tṛṣṇā gudagrahaścograḥ sadyo jahyāt sa jīvitam//
    &pakvāśayamadhiṣṭhāyaṃ hatvā saṃjñāṃ ca mārutaḥ/
    kaṇṭhe ghurghurakaṃ kṛtvā sadyo harati jīvitam//
    dantāḥ kardamadigdhābhā mukhaṃ cūrṇakasannibham/
    siprāyante ca gātrāṇi liṅgaṃ sadyo mariṣyataḥ//
    tṛṣṇāśvāsaśirorogamohadairbalyakūjanaiḥ/
    spṛṣṭaḥ prāṇāñjahātyāśu śakṛdbhedena cāturaḥ//

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    etāni khalu liṅgāni yaḥ samyagavabudhyate/
    sa jīvitaṃ ca martyānāṃ maraṇaṃ cāvabudhyate//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte indriyasthāne sadyomaraṇīyamindriyaṃ nāma daśamo+adhyāyaḥ//10//

    5.11. ekādaśo+adhyāyaḥ/

    athāto+aṇujyotīyamindriyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    aṇujyotiranekāgro duśchāyo durmanāḥ sadā/
    ratiṃ na labhate &yāti paralokaṃ samāntaram//
    baliṃ balibhṛto yasya praṇītaṃ nopabhuñjate/
    lokāntaragataḥ piṇḍaṃ bhuṅkte saṃvatsareṇa saḥ//
    saptarṣīṇāṃ samīpasthāṃ yo na paśyatyarundhatīm/
    saṃvatsarānte jantuḥ sa saṃpaśyati mahattamaḥ//
    vikṛtyā vinimittaṃ yaḥ śobhāmupacayaṃ dhanam/
    prāpnotyato vā vibhraṃśaṃ samāntaṃ tasya jīvitam//
    bhaktiḥ śīlaṃ smṛtistyāgo buddhirbalamahetukam/
    ṣaḍetāni nivartante ṣaḍbhirmāsairmariṣyataḥ//
    dhamanīnāmapūrvāṇāṃ jālamatyarthaśobhanam/
    lalāṭe dṛśyate yasya ṣaṇmāsānna sa jīvati//
    lekhābhiścandravakrābhirlalāṭamupacīyate/
    yasya tasyāyuṣaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairantaṃ samādiśet//
    śarīrakampaḥ saṃmoho gatirvacanameva ca/
    mattasyevopalabhyante yasya māsaṃ na jīvati//
    retomūtrapurīṣāṇi yasya majjanti cāmbhasi/
    sa māsāt svajanadveṣṭā mṛtyuvāriṇi majjati//
    hastapādaṃ mukhaṃ cobhe viśeṣādyasya śuṣyataḥ/
    śūyete vā vinā dehāt sa ca &māsaṃ na jīvati//
    lalāṭe mūrdhni bastau vā nīlā yasya prakāśate/
    rājī bālendukuṭilā na sa jīvitumarhati//
    pravālaguṭikābhāsā yasya gātre masūrikāḥ/
    utpadyāśu &vinaśyanti na cirāt sa vinaśyati//
    grīvāvamardo balavāñjihvāśvayathureva ca/
    bradhnāsyagalapākaśca yasya pakvaṃ tamādiśet//
    saṃbhramo+atipralāpo+atibhedo+&asthnāmatidāruṇaḥ/
    kālapāśaparītasya trayametat pravartate//
    pramuhya luñcayet keśān &parigṛhṇātyatīva ca/
    naraḥ &svasthavadāhāramabalaḥ kālacoditaḥ//
    samīpe cakṣuṣoḥ kṛtvā mṛgayetāṅgulīkaram/
    smayate+api ca kālāndha &ūrdhvagānimiṣekṣaṇaḥ//
    śayanādāsanādaṅgāt kāṣṭhāt kuḍyādathāpi vā/
    asanmṛgayate kiñcit sa muhyan kālacoditaḥ//
    ahāsyahāsī saṃmuhyan &praleḍhi daśanacchadau/
    śītapādakarocchvāso yo naro na sa jīvati//
    āhvayaṃstaṃ samīpasthaṃ svajanaṃ janameva vā/
    mahāmohāvṛtamanāḥ paśyannapi na paśyati//
    ayogamatiyogaṃ vā śarīre matimān bhiṣak/
    khādīnāṃ yugapaddṛṣṭvā bheṣajaṃ nāvacārayet//
    atipravṛddhyā rogāṇāṃ manasaśca balakṣayāt/
    vāsamutsṛjati kṣipraṃ śarīrī dehasaṃjñakam//
    varṇasvarāvannibalaṃ vāgindriyamanobalam/
    hīyate+asukṣaye nidrā nityā bhavati vā na vā//
    bhiṣagbheṣajapānānnagurumitradviṣaśca ye/
    vaśagāḥ sarva evaite boddhavyāḥ samavartinaḥ//
    eteṣu rogaḥ kramate bheṣajaṃ pratihanyate/
    naiṣāmannāni bhuñjīta na codakamapi spṛśet//
    pādāḥ sametāścatvāraḥ saṃpannāḥ sādhakairguṇaiḥ/
    vyarthā gatāyuṣo dravyaṃ vinā nāsti guṇodayaḥ//
    parīkṣyamāyurbhiṣajā nīrujasyāturasya ca/
    āyurjñānaphalaṃ kṛtsnamāyurjñe hyanuvartate//

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    kriyāpathamatikrāntāḥ kevalaṃ dehamāplutāḥ/
    cihnaṃ kurvanti yaddoṣāstadariṣṭaṃ nirucyate//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte indriyasthāne+aṇujyotīyamindriyaṃ nāmaikādaśo+adhyāyaḥ//11//

    5.12. dvādaśo+adhyāyaḥ/

    athāto gomayacūrṇīyamindriyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    yasya gomayacūrṇābhaṃ cūrṇaṃ mūrdhani jāyate/
    sasnehaṃ bhraśyate caiva māsāntaṃ tasya jīvitam//
    &nikaṣanniva yaḥ pādau cyutāṃsaḥ paridhāvati/
    vikṛtyā na sa loke+asmiṃściraṃ vasati mānavaḥ//
    yasya snātānuliptasya pūrvaṃ śuṣyatyuro bhṛśam/
    ārdreṣu sarvagātreṣu so+ardhamāsaṃ na jīvati//
    yamuddiśyāturaṃ vaidyaḥ &saṃvartayitumauṣadham/
    yatamāno na śaknoti durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam//
    vijñātaṃ bahuśaḥ siddhaṃ vidhivaccāvacāritam/
    na sidhyatyauṣadhaṃ yasya nāsti tasya cikitsitam//
    &āhāramupayuñjāno bhiṣajā sūpakalpitam/
    yaḥ phalaṃ tasya nāpnoti durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam//
    dūtādhikāre vakṣyāmo lakṣaṇāni mumūrṣatām/
    yāni dṛṣṭvā bhiṣak prājñaḥ pratyākhyāyādasaṃyamam//
    muktakeśo+athavā nagne rudatyaprayate+athavā/
    bhiṣagabhyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā dūtaṃ maraṇamādiśet//
    supte bhiṣaji ye dūtāśchindatyapi ca bhindati/
    āgacchanti bhiṣak teṣāṃ na bhartāramanuvrajet//
    juhvatyagniṃ tathā piṇḍān pitṛbhyo nirvapatyapi/
    vaidye dūtā ya āyānti te ghnanti prajighāṃsavaḥ//
    kathayatyapraśastāni cintayatyathavā punaḥ/
    vaidye dūtā manuṣyāṇāmāgacchanti mumūrṣatām//
    mṛtadagdhavinaṣṭāni bhajati vyāharatyapi/
    apraśastāni cānyāni vaidye dūtā mumūrṣatām//
    vikārasāmānyaguṇe deśe kāle+athavā bhiṣak/
    dūtamabhyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā nāturaṃ tamupācaret//
    dīnabhītadrutatrastamalināmasatīṃ striyam/
    trīn vyākṛtīṃśca ṣaṇḍāṃśca dūtān vidyānmumūrṣatām//
    aṅgavyasaninaṃ dūtaṃ liṅginaṃ vyādhitaṃ tathā/
    saṃprekṣya cograkarmāṇaṃ na vaidyo gantumarhati//
    āturārthamanuprāptaṃ kharoṣṭrarathavāhanam/
    dūtaṃ dṛdṣṭvā bhiṣagvidyādāturasya parābhavam//
    palālabusamāṃsāsthikeśalomanakhadvijān/
    mārjanīṃ musalaṃ śūrpamupānaccarma &vicyutam//
    tṛṇakāṣṭhatuṣāṅgāraṃ spṛśanto loṣṭamaśma ca/
    tatpūrvadarśane dūtā vyāharanti mumūrṣatām//
    yasmiṃśca dūte bruvati vākyamāturasaṃśrayam/
    paśyennimittamaśubhaṃ taṃ ca nānuvrajedbhiṣak//
    tathā vyasaninaṃ pretaṃ pretālaṅkārameva vā/
    bhinnaṃ dagdhaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vā tadvādīni vacāṃsi vā//
    raso vā kaṭukastīvro gandho vā kauṇapo mahān/
    sparśo vā vipulaḥ krūro yadvā+anyadaśubhaṃ bhavet//
    tatpūrvamabhito vākyaṃ vākyakāle+athavā punaḥ/
    dūtānāṃ vyāhṛtaṃ śrutvā dhīro maraṇamādiśet//
    iti dūtādhikāro+ayamuktaḥ kṛtsno mumūrṣatām/
    pathyāturakulānāṃ ca vakṣyāmyautpātikaṃ punaḥ//
    avakṣutamathotkruṣṭaṃ skhalanaṃ patanaṃ tathā/
    ākrośaḥ saṃprahāro vā pratiṣedho vigarhaṇam//
    vastroṣṇīṣottarāsaṅgaśchatropānadyugāśrayam/
    vyasanaṃ darśanaṃ cāpi mṛtavyasanināṃ tathā//
    caityadhvajapatākānāṃ pūrṇānāṃ patanāni ca/
    hatāniṣṭapravādāśca dūṣaṇaṃ bhasmapāṃśubhiḥ//
    pathacchedo biḍālena śunā sarpeṇa vā punaḥ/
    mṛgādvijānāṃ krūrāṇāṃ giro dīptāṃ diśaṃ prati//
    śayanāsanayānānāmuttānānāṃ ca darśanam/
    ityetānyapraśastāni sarvāṇyāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ//
    etāni pathi vaidyena paśyatā++āturaveśmani/
    śṛṇvatā ca na gantavyaṃ tadāgāraṃ vipaścitā//
    ityautpātikamākhyātaṃ pathi vaidyavigarhitam/
    imāmapi ca budhyeta gṛhāvasthāṃ mumūrṣatām//
    praveśe pūrṇakumbhāgnimṛdvījaphalasarpiṣām/
    vṛṣabrāhmaṇaratnānnadevatānāṃ ca nirgatim//
    agnipūrṇāni pātrāṇi bhinnāni viśikhāni ca/
    bhiṣaṅ mumūrṣatāṃ veśma praviśanneva paśyati//
    chinnabhinnāni dagdhāni bhagnāni mṛditāni ca/
    durbalāni ca sevante mumūrṣorvaiśmikā janāḥ//
    śayanaṃ vasanaṃ yānaṃ gamanaṃ bhojanaṃ rutam/
    śrūyate+amaṅgalaṃ yasya nāsti tasya cikitsitam//
    śayanaṃ vasanaṃ yānamanyaṃ vā+api paricchadam/
    pretavadyasya kurvanti suhṛdaḥ preta eva saḥ//
    annaṃ vyāpadyate+atyarthaṃ jyotiścaivopaśāmyati/
    nivāte sendhanaṃ yasya tasya nāsti cikitsitam//
    āturasya gṛhe yasya bhidyante vā patanti vā/
    atimātramamatrāṇi durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam//
    bhavanti cātra--- yaddvādaśabhiradhyāyairvyāsataḥ parikīrtitam/
    mumūrṣatāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ jīvitāntakṛt//
    tat samāsena vakṣyāmaḥ paryāyāntaramāśritam/
    paryāyavacanaṃ hyarthavijñānāyopapadyate//
    atyarthaṃ punareṛveyaṃ vivakṣā no vidhīyate/
    tasminnevādhikaraṇe yat pūrvamabhiśabditam//
    vasatāṃ caramaṃ kālaṃ śarīreṣu śarīriṇām/
    abhyugrāṇāṃ vināśāya dehebhyaḥ pravivatsatām//
    iṣṭāṃstitikṣatāṃ prāṇān kāntaṃ vāsaṃ jihāsatām/
    tantrayantreṣu bhinneṣu tamo+antyaṃ pravivikṣatām//
    vināśāyeha rūpāṇi yānyavasthāntarāṇi ca/
    bhavanti tāni vakṣyāmi yathoddeśaṃ yathāgamam//
    prāṇāḥ &samupatapyante nijñānamuparudhyate/
    vamanti balamaṅgāni ceṣṭā vyuparamanti ca//
    indriyāṇi vinaśyanti khilībhavati &cetanā/
    autsukyaṃ bhajate sattvaṃ ceto bhīrāviśatyapi//
    smṛtistyajati medhā ca hrīśriyau cāpasarpataḥ/
    upaplavante pāpmāna &ojastejaśca naśyati//
    śīlaṃ vyāvartate+atyarthaṃ bhaktiśca parivartate/
    vikriyante praticchāyāśchāyāśca vikṛtiṃ prati//
    śukraṃ pracyavate sthānādunmārgaṃ bhajate+anilaḥ/
    kṣayaṃ māṃsāni gacchanti gacchatyasṛgapi kṣayam//
    ūṣmāṇaḥ pralayaṃ yānti viśleṣaṃ yānti sandhayaḥ/
    gandhā vikṛtimāyānti bhedaṃ varṇasvarau tathā//
    vaivarṇyaṃ bhajate kāyaḥ kāyacchidraṃ viśuṣyati/
    dhūmaḥ saṃjāyate mūrdhnī dāruṇākhyaśca cūrṇakaḥ//
    satataspandanā deśāḥ śarīre ye+abhilakṣitāḥ/
    te stambhānugatāḥ sarve na calanti kathaṃcana//
    guṇāḥ śarīradeśānāṃ śītoṣṇamṛdudāruṇāḥ/
    niparyāsena vartante sthāneṣvanyeṣu tadvidhāḥ//
    nakheṣu jāyate puṣpaṃ paṅko danteṣu jāyate/
    jaṭāḥ pakṣmasu jāyante sīmantāścāpi mūrdhani//
    bheṣajāni na saṃvṛttiṃ prāpnuvanti yathāruci/
    yāni cāpyupapadyante teṣāṃ &vīryaṃ na sidhyati//
    nānāprakṛtayaḥ krūrā vikārā vividhauṣadhāḥ/
    kṣipraṃ samabhivartante pratihatya balaujasī//
    śabdaḥ sparśo raso rūpaṃ gandhaśceṣṭā &vicintitam/
    utpadyante+aśubhānyeva pratikarmapravṛttiṣu//
    dṛśyante dāruṇāḥ svapnā daurātmyamupajāyate/
    preṣyāḥ pratīpatāṃ yānti pretākṛtirudīryate//
    prakṛtirhīyate+atyarthaṃ vikṛtiścābhivardhate/
    kṛtsnamautpātikaṃ ghoramari(ni)ṣṭamupalakṣyate//
    ityetāni manuṣyāṇāṃ bhavanti vinaśiṣyatām/
    lakṣaṇāni yathoddeśaṃ yānyuktāni yathāgamam//
    maraṇāyeha rūpāṇi paśyatā+api bhiṣagvidā/
    apṛṣṭena na vaktavyaṃ maraṇaṃ pratyupasthitam//
    pṛṣṭenāpi na vaktavyaṃ tatra yatropaghātakam/
    āturasya bhavedduḥkhamathavā+anyasya kasyacit//
    abruvanmaraṇaṃ tasya nainamiccheccikitsitum/
    yasya paśyedvināśāya liṅgāni kuśalo bhiṣak//
    liṅgebhyo maraṇākhyebhyo viparītāni paśyatā/
    liṅgānyārogyamāgantu vaktavyaṃ bhiṣajā dhruvam//
    dūtairautpātikairbhāvaiḥ pathyāturakulāśrayaiḥ/
    āturācāraśīleṣṭadravyasaṃpattilakṣaṇaiḥ//
    svācāraṃ hṛṣṭamavyaṅgaṃ yaśasyaṃ śuklavāsasam/
    amuṇḍamajaṭaṃ dūtaṃ jātiveśakriyāsamam//
    anuṣṭrakharayānasthamasandhyāsvagraheṣu ca/
    adāruṇeṣu nakṣatreṣvanugreṣu &dhruveṣu ca//
    vinā caturthīṃ navamīṃ vinā riktāṃ caturdaśīm/
    madhyāhnamardharātraṃ ca bhūkampaṃ rāhudarśanam//
    vinā deśamaśastaṃ cāśastautpātikalakṣaṇam/
    dūtaṃ praśastamavyagraṃ nirdiśedāgataṃ bhiṣak//
    dadhyakṣatadvijātīnāṃ vṛṣabhāṇāṃ nṛpasya ca//
    ratnānāṃ pūrṇakumbhānāṃ sitasya turagasya ca/
    suradhvajapatākānāṃ phalānāṃ &yāvakasya ca//
    kanyāpuṃvardhamānānāṃ baddhasyaikapaśostasthā/
    pṛthivyā uddhṛtāyāśca vahneḥ prajvalitasya ca//
    modakānāṃ sumanasāṃ śuklānāṃ candanasya ca/
    manojñasyānnapānasya pūrṇasya śakaṭasya ca//
    nṛbhirdhenvāḥ savatsāyā vaḍavāyāḥ striyāstathā/
    jīvañjīvakasiddhārthasārasapriyavādinām//
    haṃsānāṃ śatapatrāṇāṃ cāṣāṇāṃ śikhināṃ tathā/
    matsyājadvijaśaṅkhānāṃ &priyaṅgūnāṃ ghṛtasya ca//
    rucakādarśasiddhārtharocanānāṃ ca darśanam/
    gandhaḥ surabhirvarṇaśca suśuklo madhuro rasaḥ//
    mṛgapakṣimanuṣyāṇāṃ praśastāśca giraḥ śubhāḥ/
    chatradhvajapatākānāmutkṣepaṇamabhiṣṭutiḥ//
    bherīmṛdaṅgaśaṅkhānāṃ śabdāḥ puṇyāhanisvanāḥ/
    vedādhyayanaśabdāśca sukho vāyuḥ pradakṣiṇaḥ//
    pathi veśmapraveśe tu vidyādārogyalakṣaṇam/
    maṅgalācārasaṃpannaḥ sāruto vaiśmiko janaḥ//
    śraddadhāno+anukūlaśca prabhūtadravyasaṃgrahaḥ/
    dhanaiśvaryasukhāvāptiriṣṭalābhaḥ sukhena ca//
    dravyāṇāṃ tatra yogyānāṃ yojanā siddhireva ca/
    gṛhaprāsādaśailānāṃ nāgānāmṛṣabhasya ca//
    hayānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ ca svapne samadhirohaṇam/
    somārkāgnidvijātīnāṃ gavāṃ nṝṇāṃ payāsvinām//
    arṇavānāṃ prataraṇaṃ vṛddhiḥ saṃbādhaniḥsṛtiḥ/
    svapne devaiḥ sapitṛbhiḥ prasannaiścābhibhāṣaṇam//
    darśanaṃ śuklavastrāṇāṃ hradasya vimalasya ca/
    māṃsamatsyaviṣāmedhyacchatrādarśaparigrahaḥ//
    svapne sumanasāṃ caiva śuklānāṃ darśanaṃ śubham/
    aśvagorathayānaṃ ca yānaṃ pūrvottareṇa ca/
    rodanaṃ patitotthānaṃ dviṣatāṃ cāvamardanam//
    sattvalakṣaṇasaṃyogo bhaktirvaidyadvijātiṣu/
    sādhyatvaṃ na ca nirvedastadārogyasya lakṣaṇaṃ//
    ārogyādbalamāyuśca sukhaṃ ca labhate mahat/
    iṣṭāṃścāpyaparān bhāvān puruṣaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ//

    tatra ślokau ---

    uktaṃ gomayacūrṇīye maraṇārogyalakṣaṇam/
    dūtasvapnāturotpātayuktisiddhivyapāśrayam//
    itīdamuktaṃ prakṛtaṃ yathātathaṃ tadanvavekṣyaṃ satataṃ bhiṣagvidā/
    tathā hi siddhiṃ ca yaśaśca śāśvataṃ sa siddhakarmā labhate dhanāni ca//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte indriyasthāne gomayacūrṇīyamindriyaṃ nāma dvādaśo+adhyāyaḥ//12//

    indriyasthānaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ/carakasaṃhitā

    6. cikitsāsthānam/

    6.1. prathamo+adhyāyaḥ/

    6.1.1.

    rasāyanādhyāye prathamaḥ pādaḥ/

    athāto+abhayāmalakīyaṃ rasāyanapādaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    cikitsitaṃ vyādhiharaṃ pathyaṃ sādhanamauṣadham/
    prāyaścittaṃ praśamanaṃ prakṛtisthāpanaṃ hitam//
    vidyādbheṣajanāmāni,bheṣajaṃ dvividhaṃ ca tat/
    svasthasyorjaskaraṃ kiñcit kiñcidārtasya roganut//
    abheṣajaṃ ca dvividhaṃ bādhanaṃ sānubādhanam/
    svasthasyorjaskaraṃ yattu tadvṛṣyaṃ tadrasāyanam//
    prāyaḥ,prāyeṇa rogāṇāṃ dvitīyaṃ praśame matam/
    prāyaḥśabdo viśeṣārtho hyubhayaṃ hyubhayārthakṛt//
    dīrghamāyuḥ smṛtiṃ medhāmārogyaṃ taruṇaṃ vayaḥ/
    prabhāvarṇasvaraudāryaṃ dehendriyabalaṃ param//
    vāksiddhiṃ &praṇatiṃ kāntiṃ labhate nā rasāyanāt/
    &'vṛṣatāṃ` iti pā-. lābhopāyo hi śastānāṃ rasādīnāṃ rasāyanam//
    apatyasaṃtānakaraṃ yat sadyaḥ saṃpraharṣaṇam/
    vājīvātibalo yena yātyapratihataḥ striyaḥ//
    bhavatyatipriyaḥ strīṇāṃ yena yenopacīyate/
    jīryato+apyakṣayaṃ śukraṃ phalavadyena dṛśyate//
    prabhūtaśākhaḥ śākhīva yena caityo yathā mahān/
    &bhavatyarcyo bahumataḥ prajānāṃ subahuprajaḥ//
    &`bhavatyardhyo bahumataḥ' iti,&`bhavaty asau bahumataḥ' iti ca pā-.
    saṃtānamūlaṃ yeneha pretya cānantyamaśnute/
    yaśaḥ śriyaṃ balaṃ puṣṭiṃ vājīkaraṇameva tat//
    svasthasyorjaskaraṃ tvetaddvividhaṃ proktamauṣadham/
    yadvyādhinirghātakaraṃ vakṣyate taccikitsite//
    cikitsitārtha etāvān vikārāṇāṃ yadauṣadham/
    rasāyanavidhiścāgre vājīkaraṇameva ca//
    abheṣajamiti jñeyaṃ viparītaṃ yadauṣadhāt/
    tadasevyaṃ viṣevyaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yadauṣadham//
    rasāyanānāṃ dvividhaṃ prayogamṛṣayo viduḥ/
    kuṭīprāveśikaṃ caiva vātātapikameva ca//
    kuṭīprāveśikasyādau vidhiḥ samupadekṣyate/
    nṛpavaidyadvijātīnāṃ sādhūnāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām//
    nivāse nirbhaye śaste prāpyopakaraṇe pure/
    diśi pūrvottarasyāṃ ca subhūmau kārayet kuṭīm//
    vistārotsedhasaṃpannāṃ trigarbhāṃ sūkṣmalocanām/
    ghanabhittimṛtusukhāṃ suspaṣṭāṃ manasaḥ priyām//
    śabdādīnāmaśastānāmagamyāṃ strīvivarjitām/
    iṣṭopakaraṇopetāṃ &sajjavaudyauṣadhadvijām//
    &`sakta-' iti pā-.
    athodagayane śukle tithinakṣatrapūjite/
    muhūrtakaraṇopete praśaste kṛtavāpanaḥ//
    dhṛtismṛtibalaṃ kṛtvā śraddadhānaḥ samāhitaḥ/
    vidhūya mānasān doṣān maitrīṃ bhūteṣu cintayan//
    devatāḥ pūjayitvā+agre dvijātīṃśca pradakṣiṇam/
    devagobrāhmaṇān kṛtvā tatastāṃ praviśet kuṭīm//
    tasyāṃ saṃśodhanaiḥ śuddhaḥ sukhī jātabalaḥ punaḥ/
    rasāyanaṃ prayuñjīta &tatpravakṣyāmi śodhanam//
    &`tato vakṣyāmi' iti pā-.
    harītakīnāṃ cūrṇāni saindhavāmalake guḍam/
    vacāṃ viḍaṅgaṃ rajanīṃ pippalīṃ viśvabheṣajam//
    pibeduṣṇāmbunā jantuḥ snehasvedopapāditaḥ/
    tena śuddhaśarīrāya kṛtasaṃsarjanāya ca//
    trirātraṃ yāvakaṃ dadyāt pañcāhaṃ vā+api sarpiṣā/
    saptāhaṃ vā purāṇasya yāvacchuddhestu varcasaḥ//
    śuddhakoṣṭhaṃ tu taṃ jñātvā rasāyanamupācaret/
    vayaḥprakṛtisātmyajño yaugikaṃ yasya yadbhavet//
    harītakīṃ pañcarasāmuṣṇāmalavaṇaṃ śivām/
    doṣānulomanīṃ laghvīṃ vidyāddīpanapācanīm//
    āyuṣyāṃ pauṣṭikīṃ dhanyāṃ vayasaḥ sthāpanīṃ parām/
    sarvarogapraśamanīṃ buddhīndriyabalapradām//
    kuṣṭhaṃ gulmamudāvartaṃ śoṣaṃ pāṇḍvāmayaṃ madam/
    arśāṃsi grahaṇīdoṣaṃ purāṇaṃ viṣamajvaram//
    hṛdrogaṃ saśirorogamatīsāramarocakam/
    kāsaṃ pramehamānāhaṃ plīhānamudaraṃ navam//
    kaphaprasekaṃ vaisvaryaṃ vaivarṇyaṃ kāmalāṃ krimīn/
    śvayathuṃ tamakaṃ chardiṃ klaibyamaṅgāvasādanam//
    srotovibandhān vividhān pralepaṃ hṛdayorasoḥ/
    smṛtibuddhipramohaṃ ca jayecchīghraṃ harītakī//
    (&ajīrṇino rūkṣabhujaḥ strīmadyaviṣakarśitāḥ/
    severannābhayāmete kṣuttṛṣṇoṣṇārditāśca ye//) &'yogīndranāthasena saṃmato+ayaṃ pāṭhaḥ'.
    tān guṇāṃstāni karmāṇi vidyādāmalakīṣvapi/
    yānyuktāni harītakyā vīryasya tu viparyayaḥ//
    ataścāmṛtakalpāni vidyāt karmabhirīdṛśaiḥ/
    harītakīnāṃ śasyāni bhiṣagāmalakasya ca//
    auṣadhīnāṃ parā bhūmirhimavāñ śailasattamaḥ/
    tasmātphalāni tajjāni grāhayetkālajāni tu//
    āpūrṇarasavīryāṇi kāle kāle yathāvidhi/
    ādityapavanacchāyāsalilaprīṇitāni ca//
    &yānyajagdhānyapūtīni nirvraṇānyagadāni ca/
    teṣāṃ prayogaṃ vakṣyāmi phalānāṃ karma cottamam//
    &`yānyadagdhāni' iti pā-.
    pañcānāṃ pañcamūlānāṃ bhāgān daśapalonmitān/
    harītakīsahasraṃ ca triguṇāmalakaṃ navam//
    vidārigandhāṃ bṛhatīṃ pṛśniparṇīṃ nidigdhikām/
    vidyādvidārigandhādyaṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāpañcamaṃ gaṇam//
    bilvāgnimanthaśyonākaṃ kāśmaryamatha pāṭalām/
    punarnavāṃ śūrpaparṇyau balāmeraṇḍameva ca//
    jīvakarṣabhakau medāṃ jīvantīṃ saśatāvarīm/
    śarekṣudarbhakāśānāṃ śālīnāṃ mūlameva ca//
    ityeṣāṃ pañcamūlānāṃ pañcānāmupakalpayet/
    bhagān yathoktāṃstatsarvaṃ sādhyaṃ daśaguṇe+ambhasi//
    daśabhāgāvaśeṣaṃ tu pūtaṃ taṃ grāhayedrasam/
    harītakīśca tāḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṇyāmalakāni ca//
    tāni sarvāṇyanasthīni phalānyāpothya kūrcanaiḥ/
    vinīya tasminniryūhe cūrṇānīmāni dāpayet//
    maṇḍūkaparṇyāḥ pippalyāḥ śaṅkhapuṣpyāḥ plavasya ca/
    mustānāṃ saviḍaṅgānāṃ candanāguruṇostathā//
    madhukasya haridrāyā vacāyāḥ kanakasya ca/
    bhāgāṃścatuṣpalān kṛtvā sūkṣmailāyāstvacastathā//
    sitopalāsahasraṃ ca cūrṇitaṃ tulayā+adhikam/
    tailasya dvyāḍhakaṃ tatra dadyāttrīṇi ca sarpiṣaḥ//
    sādhyamaudumbare pātre tat sarvaṃ mṛdunā+agninā/
    jñātvā &lehyamadagdhaṃ ca śītaṃ kṣaudreṇa saṃsṛjet//
    &`lehamadagdhaṃ' iti pā-.
    kṣaudrapramāṇaṃ snehārdhaṃ tat sarvaṃ ghṛtabhājane/
    tiṣṭhetsaṃmūrcchitaṃ tasya mātrāṃ kāle prayojayet//
    yā &noparundhyādāhāramekaṃ mātrā jarāṃ prati/
    ṣaṣṭikaḥ payasā cātra jīrṇe bhojanamiṣyate//
    &`-dāhāramevaṃ' iti pā-.
    vaikhānasā vālakhilyāstathā cānye tapodhanāḥ/
    rasāyanamidaṃ &prāśya babhūvuramitāyuṣaḥ//
    &`prāpya' iti pā-.
    muktvā jīrṇaṃ vapuścāgryamavāpustaruṇaṃ vayaḥ/
    vītatandrāklamaśvāsā nirātaṅkāḥ samāhitāḥ//
    medhāsmṛtibalopetāścirarātraṃ tapodhanāḥ/
    brāhmaṃ tapo brahmacaryaṃ ceruścātyantaniṣṭhayā//
    rasāyanamidaṃ brāhmāyuṣkāmaḥ prayojayet/
    dīrghamāyurvayaścāgryāṃ kāmāṃśceṣṭān samaśnute//

    (iti brāhmarasāyanam)

    yathoktaguṇānāmāmalakānāṃ sahasraṃ piṣṭasvedanavidhinā payasa ūṣmaṇā susvinnamanātapaśuṣkamanasthi cūrṇayet/

    tadāmalakasahasrasvarasaparipītaṃ sthirāpunarnavājīvantīnāgabalābrahmasuvarcalāmaṇḍūkaparṇīśatāvarīśaṅkhapuṣpīpippalīvacāviḍaṅgasvayaṅguptāmṛtācandanāgurumadhukamadhūkapuṣpotpalapadmamālatīyuvatīyūthikācūrṇāṣṭabhāgasaṃyuktaṃ punarnāgabalāsahasrapalasvarasaparipītamanātapaśuṣkaṃ dviguṇitasarpiṣā kṣaudrasarpiṣā vā kṣudraguḍākṛtiṃ kṛtvā śucau dṛḍhe ghṛtabhāvite kumbhe bhasmarāśeradhaḥ sthāpayedantarbhūmeḥ pakṣaṃ kṛtarakṣāvidhānamatharvavedavidā, pakṣātyaye coddhṛtya kanakarajatatāmrapravālakālāyasacūrṇāṣṭabhāgasaṃyuktamardhakarṣavṛddhyā yathoktena vidhinā prātaḥ prātaḥ prayuñjāno+agnibalamabhisamīkṣya, jīrṇe ca ṣaṣṭikaṃ payasā sasarpiṣkamupasevamāno yathoktān guṇān samaśnuta iti//

    bhavanti cātra---

    idaṃ rasāyanaṃ brāhmaṃ maharṣigaṇasevitam/
    bhavatyarogo dīrghāyuḥ prayuñjāno mahābalaḥ//
    kāntaḥ prajānāṃ siddhārthaścandrādityasamadyutiḥ/
    śrutaṃ dhārayate sattvamārṣaṃ cāsya pravartate//
    dharaṇīdharasāraśca vāyunā samavikramaḥ/
    sa bhavatyaviṣaṃ cāsya gātre saṃpadyate viṣam//
    (iti dvitīyaṃ brāhmarasāyanam)
    bilvo+agnimanthaḥ śyonākaḥ kāśmaryaḥ pāṭalirbalā/
    parṇyaścatasraḥ pippalyaḥ śvadaṃṣṭrā bṛhatīdvayam//
    śṛṅgī tāmalakī drākṣā jīvantī puṣkarāguru/
    abhayā cāmṛtā ṛddhirjīvakarṣabhakau śaṭī//
    mustaṃ punarnavā medā sailā candanamutpalam/
    vidārī vṛṣamūlāni kākolī kākanāsikā//
    eṣāṃ palonmitān bhāgāṅchatānyāmalakasya ca/
    pañca dadyāttadaikadhyaṃ jaladroṇe vipācayet//
    jñātvā gatarasānyetānyauṣadhānyatha taṃ rasam/
    taccāmalakamuddhṛtya niṣkulaṃ tailasarpiṣoḥ//
    paladvādaśake bhṛṣṭvā dattvā cārdhatulāṃ bhiṣak/
    matsyaṇḍikāyāḥ pūtāyā lehavatsādhu sādhayet//
    ṣaṭpalaṃ madhunaścātra siddhaśīte pradāpayet/
    catuṣpalaṃ tugākṣīryāḥ pippalīdvipalaṃ tathā//
    palamekaṃ nidadhyācca tvagelāpatrakeśarāt/
    ityayaṃ cyavanapraśaḥ paramukto rasāyanaḥ//
    kāsaśvāsaharaścaiva viśeṣeṇopadiśyate/
    kṣīṇakṣatānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ bālānāṃ cāṅgavardhanaḥ//
    svarakṣayamurorogaṃ hṛdrogaṃ vātaśoṇitam/
    pipāsāṃ mūtraśukrasthān doṣāṃścāpyapakarṣati//
    asya mātrāṃ prayuñjīta yoparundhyānna bhojanam/
    asya prayogāccyavanaḥ suvṛddho+abhūt punaryuvā//
    medhāṃ smṛtiṃ kāntimanāmayatvamāyuḥprakarṣaṃ balamindriyāṇām/
    strīṣu praharṣaṃ paramagnivṛddhiṃ varṇaprasādaṃ pavanānulomyam//
    rasāyanasyāsya naraḥ prayogāllabheta jīrṇo+api kuṭīpraveśāt/
    jarākṛtaṃ rūpamapāsya sarvaṃ bibharti rūpaṃ navayauvanasya//

    (iti cyavanaprāśaḥ/)

    athāmalakaharītakīnāmāmalakabibhītakānāṃ harītakībibhītakānāmāmalakaharītakībibhītakānāṃ vā palāśatvagavanaddhānāṃ mṛdā+avaliptānāṃ kukūlasvinnānāmakulakānāṃ palasahasramulūkhale saṃpothya dadhighṛtamadhupalalatailaśarkarāsaṃyuktaṃ bhakṣayedanannabhugyathoktena vidhinā; tasyānte yavāgvādibhiḥ pratyavasthāpanam [Note: `prakṛtyavasthāpanaṃ' iti pā-.] abhyaṅgotsādanaṃ sarpiṣā yavacūrṇaiśca, ayaṃ ca rasāyanaprayogaprakarṣo [Note: `dvistāvat prayogakālād dviguṇakālaṃ pratibhojanaṃ yavāgūḥ yūṣeṇa payasā vā sasarpiṣkaḥ ṣaṣṭikaḥ ṣaṣṭikānnaṃ' iti yogīndranāthasenaḥ.]dvistāvadagnibalamabhisamīkṣya, pratibhojanaṃ yūṣeṇa payasā vā ṣaṣṭikaḥ sasarpiṣkaḥ, ataḥ paraṃ yathāsukhavihāraḥ kāmabhakṣyaḥ syāt/

    anena prayogeṇarṣayaḥ punaryuvatvamavāpurbabhūvuścānekavarṣaśatajīvino nirvikārāḥ paraṃ śarīrabuddhīndriyabalasamuditāśceruścātyantaniṣṭhayā tapaḥ//

    (iti caturthāmalakarasāyanam/)

    harītakyāmalakabibhītakapañcapañcamūlaniryūhe pippalīmadhukamadhūkakākolīkṣīrakākolyātmaguptājīvakarṣabhakakṣīraśuklākalkasaṃprayuktena vidārīsvarasena kṣīrāṣṭaguṇasaṃprayuktena ca sarpiṣaḥ kumbhaṃ sādhayitvā &prayuñjāno+agnibalasamāṃ mātrāṃ jīrṇe ca kṣīrasarpirbhyāṃ śāliṣaṣṭikamuṣṇodakānupānamaśnañjarāvyādhipāpābhicāravyapagatabhayaḥ śarīrendriyabuddhibalamatulamupalabhyāpratihatasarvārambhaḥ paramāyuranavāpnuyāt//

    &`prayuñjītāgnibalaṃ samavekṣya, jīrṇe ca' iti pā-. (iti pañcamo harītakīyogaḥ/)

    harītakyāmalakabibhītakaharidrāsthirā-&balāviḍaṅgāmṛtavallīviśvabheṣajamadhukapippalīsomavalkasiddhena kṣīrasarpiṣā madhuśarkarābhyāmapi ca sannīyāmalakasvarasaśataparipītamāmalakacūrṇamayaścūrṇacaturbhāgasaṃprayuktaṃ pāṇitalamātraṃ pāṇitalamātraṃ prātaḥ prātaḥ prāśya yathoktena vidhinā sāyaṃ mudgayūṣeṇa payasā vā sasarpiṣkaṃ śāliṣaṣṭikānnamaśnīyāt, trivarṣaprayogādasya varṣaśatamajaraṃ vayastiṣṭhiti, śrutamavatiṣṭhate, sarvāmayāḥ praśāmyanti, viṣamaviṣaṃ bhavati gātre, gātramaśmavat sthirībhavati, adhṛṣyo bhūtānāṃ bhavati//

    &`-vācā-' iti pā-.

    bhavanti cātra---

    yathā+amarāṇāmamṛtaṃ yathā bhogavatāṃ sudhā/
    tathā+abhavanmaharṣīṇāṃ rasāyanavidhiḥ purā//
    na jarāṃ na ca daurbalyaṃ nāturyaṃ nidhanaṃ na ca/
    jagmurvarṣasahasrāṇi rasāyanaparāḥ purā//
    na kevalaṃ dīrghamihāyuraśnute rasāyanaṃ yo vidhivanniṣevate/
    gatiṃ sa devarṣiniṣevitāṃ śubhāṃ prapadyate brahma tatheti &cākṣayam//
    &`cākṣaram' iti pā-.
    tatra ślokaḥ--- abhayāmalakīye+asmin ṣaḍyogāḥ parikīrtitāḥ/
    rasāyanānāṃ siddhānāmāyuryairanuvartate//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne rasāyanādhyāye+abhayāmalakīyo nāma rasāyanapādaḥ prathamaḥ//1//

    6.1.2.

    rasāyanādhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ/

    athātaḥ prāṇakāmīyaṃ rasāyanapādaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    prāṇakāmaḥ śuśrūṣadhvamidamucyamānamamṛtamivāparamaditisutahitakaramacintyādbhutaprabhāvamāyuṣyamārogyakaraṃ vayasaḥ sthāpanaṃ nidrātandrāśramaklamālasyadaurbalyāpaharamanilakaphapittasāmyakaraṃ sthairyakaramabaddhamāṃsaharamantaragnisandhukṣaṇaṃ pramāvarṇasvarottamakaraṃ rasāyanavidhānam/

    anena cyavanādayo maharṣayaḥ punaryuvatvamāpurnārīṇāṃ ceṣṭatamā babhūvuḥ, sthirasamasuvibhaktamāṃsāḥ, susaṃhatasthiraśarīrāḥ, suprasannabalavarṇendriyāḥ, sarvatrāpratihataparākramāḥ, kleśasahāśca/

    sarve śarīradoṣā bhavanti grāmyāhārādamlalavaṇakaṭukakṣāraśuṣkaśāka-&māṃsatilapalalapiṣṭānnabhojināṃ virūḍhanavaśūkaśamīdhānyaviruddhāsātmyarūkṣakṣārābhiṣyandibhojināṃ klinnagurupūtiparyuṣitabhojināṃ viṣamādhyaśanaprāyāṇāṃ divāsvapnastrīmadyanityānāṃ viṣamātimātravyāyāmasaṃkṣobhitaśarīrāṇāṃ bhayakrodhaśokalobhamohāyāsabahulānām; &&atonimittaṃ hi śithilībhavanti māṃsāni, vimucyante sandhayaḥ, vidahyate raktaṃ, viṣyandate cānalpaṃ medaḥ, na sandhīyate+asthiṣu majjā, śukraṃ na pravartate, kṣayamupaityojaḥ; sa evaṃbhūto glāyati, sīdati, nidrātandrālasyasamanvito nirutsāhaḥ śvasiti, asamarthaśceṣṭānāṃ śārīramānasīnāṃ, naṣṭasmṛtibuddhicchāyo rogāṇāmadhiṣṭhānabhūto na sarvamāyuravāpnoti/

    tasmādetān doṣānavekṣamāṇaḥ sarvān yathoktānahitānapāsyāhāravihārān rasāyanāni prayoktumarhatītyuktvā bhagavān punarvasurātreya uvāca---//

    &`māṣa' iti pā-. &&`ato nimittāddhi' iti pa-.

    āmalakānāṃ subhūmijānāṃ kālajānāmanupahatagandhavarṇarasānāmāpūrṇarasapramāṇavīryāṇāṃ svarasena punarnavākalkapādasaṃprayuktena sarpiṣaḥ sādhayedāḍhakam, ataḥ paraṃ vidārīsvarasena jīvantīkalkasaṃprayuktena, ataḥ paraṃ caturguṇena payasā balātibalākaṣāyeṇa śatāvarīkalkasaṃyuktena; anena krameṇaikaikaṃ śatapākaṃ sahasrapākaṃ vā śarkarākṣaudracaturbhāgasaṃprayuktaṃ sauvarṇe rājate mārtike vā śucau dṛḍhe ghṛtabhāvite kumbhe sthāpayet; tadyathoktena vidhinā yathāgni prātaḥ prātaḥ prayojayet, jīrṇe ca kṣīrasarpirbhyāṃ śāliṣaṣṭikamaśnīyāt/

    asya prayogādvarṣaśataṃ vayo+ajaraṃ tiṣṭhati, śrutamavatiṣṭhate, sarvāmayāḥ praśāmyanti, apratihatagatiḥ strīṣu, apatyavān bhavatīti//

    bhavataścātra---

    bṛhaccharīraṃ girisārasāraṃ sthirendriyaṃ cātibalendriyaṃ ca/
    adhṛṣyamanyairatikāntarūpaṃ praśastipūjāsukhacittabhāk ca//
    balaṃ mahadvarṇaviśuddhiragryā svaro ghanaughastanitānukārī/
    bhavatyapatyaṃ vipulaṃ sthiraṃ ca samaśnato yogamimaṃ narasya//

    (ityāmalakaghṛtam/)

    āmalakasahasraṃ pippalīsahasrasaṃprayuktaṃ palāśataruṇakṣārodakottaraṃ tiṣṭhet, tadanugatakṣārodakamanātapaśuṣkamanasthi cūrṇīkṛtaṃ caturguṇābhyāṃ madhusarpirbhyāṃ saṃnīya śarkarācūrṇacaturbhāgasaṃprayuktaṃ ghṛtabhājanasthaṃ ṣaṇmāsān sthāpayedantarbhūmeḥ/

    tasyottarakālamagnibalasamāṃ mātrāṃ khādet, paurvāhṇikaḥ prayogo nāparāhṇikaḥ, sātmyāpekṣaścāhāravidhiḥ/

    asya prayogādvarṣaśatamajaraṃ vayastiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//

    (ityāmalakāvalehaḥ/)

    āmalakacūrṇāḍhakamekaviṃśatirātramāmalakasvarasaparipītaṃ madhughṛtāḍhakābhyāṃ dvābhyāmekīkṛtamaṣṭabhāgapippalīkaṃ śarkarācūrṇacaturbhāgasaṃprayuktaṃ ghṛtabhājanasthaṃ prāvṛṣi bhasmarāśau nidadhyāt; tadvarṣānte sātmyapathyāśī prayojayet; asya prayogādvarṣaśatamajaramāyustiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//

    (ityāmalakacūrṇam/)

    viḍaṅgataṇḍulacūrṇānāmāḍhakamāḍhakaṃ pippalītaṇḍulānāmadhyardhāḍhakaṃ sitopalāyāḥ sarpistailamadhvāḍhakaiḥ ṣaḍbhirekīkṛtaṃ ghṛtabhājanasthaṃ prāvṛṣi bhasmarāśāviti sarvaṃ samānaṃ pūrveṇa yāvadāśīḥ//

    (iti viḍaṅgāvalehaḥ/)

    yathoktaguṇānāmāmalakānāṃ sahasramārdrapalāśadroṇyāṃ sapidhānāyāṃ bāṣpamanudvamantyāmāraṇyagomayāgnibhirupasvedayet, tāni susvinnaśītānyuddhṛtakulakānyāpothyāḍhakena pippalīcūrṇānāmāḍhakena ca viḍaṅgataṇḍulacūrṇānāmadhyardhena cāḍhakena śarkarāyā dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāmāḍhakābhyāṃ tailasya madhunaḥ sarpiṣaśca saṃyojya śucau dṛḍhe ghṛtabhānite kumbhe sthāpayedekaviṃśatirātram, ata ūrdhvaṃ prayogaḥ; asya prayogādvarṣaśatamajaramāyustiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//

    (ityāmalakāvaleho+aparaḥ/)

    dhanvani kuśāstīrṇe snigdhakuṣṇamadhuramṛttike suvarṇavarṇamṛttike vā vyapagataviṣaśvāpadapavanasalilāgnidoṣe karṣaṇavalmīkaśmaśānacaityoṣarāvasathavarjite deśe yathartusukhapavanasalilādityasevite jātānyanupahatānyanadhyārūḍhānyabālānyajīrṇānyadhigatavīryāṇi śīrṇapurāṇaparṇāny-&asaṃjātānyaparṇāni tapasi tapasye vā māse śuciḥ prayataḥ kṛtadevārcanaḥ svasti vācayitvā dvijātīn &&cale sumuhūrte nāgabalāmūlānyuddharet, teṣāṃ suprakṣālitānāṃ tvakpiṇḍamāmramātramakṣamātraṃ vā ślakṣṇapiṣṭamāloḍya payasā prātaḥ prayojayet, cūrṇīkṛtāni vā pibet payasā, madhusarpirbhyāṃ vā saṃyojya bhakṣayet, jīrṇe ca &&&kṣīrasarpirbhyāṃ śāliṣaṣṭikamaśnīyāt/

    saṃvatsaraprayogādasya varṣaśatamajaraṃ vayastiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//

    &`asañjātaphalāni' iti pā-. &&gaṅgādharas tu `bale muhūrte' iti paṭhitvā `balavati sumuhūrte' iti vyākhyām ayati. &&&`payasā sasarpiṣkaṃ' iti pā-. (iti nāgabalārasāyanam/)

    balātibalācandanāgurudhavatiniśakhadiraśiṃśapāsanasvarasāḥ punarnavāntāścauṣadhayo &daśa nāgabalayā vyākhyātāḥ/

    svarasānāmalābhe tvayaṃ svarasavidhiḥ---cūrṇānāmāḍhakamāḍhakamudakasyāhorātrasthitaṃ mṛditapūtaṃ svarasavat prayojyam//

    &`daśa yā vayaḥ sthāpanā vyākhyātāstāsāṃ svarasā nāgabalāvat' iti pā-.

    bhallātakānyanupahatānyanāmayānyāpūrṇarasapramāṇavīryāṇi pakvajāmbavaprakāśāni śucau śukre vā māse saṃgṛhya yavapalle māṣapalle vā nidhāpayet, tāni caturmāsasthitāni sahasi sahasye vā māse prayoktumārabheta śītasnigdhamadhuropaskṛtaśarīraḥ/

    pūrvaṃ daśabhallātakānyāpothyāṣṭaguṇenāmbhasā sādhu sādhayet, teṣāṃ rasamaṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣaṃ pūtaṃ sapayaskaṃ pibet sarpiṣā+antarmukhamabhyajya/

    tānyekaikabhallātakotkarṣāpakarṣeṇa daśabhallātakānyātriṃśataḥ prayojyāni, nātaḥ paramutkarṣaḥ/

    prayogavidhānena sahasrapara eva bhallātakaprayogaḥ/

    jīrṇe ca sasarpiṣā payasā śāliṣaṣṭikāśanamupacāraḥ, prayogānte ca dvistāvat payasaivopacāraḥ/

    tatprayogādvarṣaśatamajaraṃ vayastiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//

    (iti bhallātakakṣīram/)

    bhallātakānāṃ jarjarīkṛtānāṃ piṣṭasvedanaṃ pūrayitvā bhūmāvākaṇṭhaṃ nikhātasya snehabhāvitasya dṛḍhasyopari kumbhasyāropyoḍupenāpidhāya kṛṣṇamṛttikāvaliptaṃ gomayāgnibhirupasvedayet; teṣāṃ yaḥ svarasaḥ kumbhaṃ prapadyeta, tamaṣṭabhāgamadhusaṃprayuktaṃ dviguṇaghṛtamadyāt; tatprayogādvarṣaśatamajaraṃ vayastiṣṭhatīti samanaṃ pūrveṇa//

    (iti bhallātakakṣaudram/)

    bhallātakatailapātraṃ sapayaskaṃ madhukena kalkenākṣamātreṇa śatapākaṃ kuryāditi samānaṃ pūrveṇa//

    (iti bhallātakatailam/)

    &bhallātakasarpiḥ, bhallātakakṣīraṃ, bhallātakakṣaudraṃ, guḍabhallātakaṃ, bhallātakayūṣaḥ, bhallātakatailaṃ, bhallātakapalalaṃ, bhallātakasaktavaḥ, bhallātakalavaṇaṃ, bhallātakatarpaṇam, iti bhallātakavidhānamuktaṃ bhavati//

    &yogīndranāthasenas tu `evaṃ guḍabhallātakaṃ, bhallātakayūṣo, bhallātakasarpiḥ, bhallātakapalalaṃ' ity ādi pāṭhaṃ paṭhati.

    bhavanti cātra---

    bhallātakāni tīkṣṇāni pākīnyagnisamāni ca/
    bhavantyamṛtakalpāni prayuktāni yathāvidhi//
    ete daśavidhāstveṣāṃ prayogāḥ parikīrtitāḥ/
    rogaprakṛtisātmyajñastān prayogān prakalpayet//
    kaphajo na sa rogo+asti na vibandho+asti kaścana/
    yaṃ na bhallātakaṃ hanyācchīghraṃ medhāgnivardhanam//

    (iti bhallātakavidhiḥ/)

    prāṇakāmāḥ purā jīrṇāścyavanādyā maharṣayaḥ/

    rasāyanaiḥ śivairetairbabhūvuramitāyuṣaḥ//

    &brāhmaṃ tapo brāhmacaryamadhyātmadhyānameva ca/

    dīrghāyuṣo yathākāmaṃ saṃbhṛtya tridivaṃ gatāḥ//

    &`jñānaṃ' iti pā-.

    tasmādāyuḥprakarṣārthaṃ prāṇakāmaiḥ sukhārthibhiḥ/

    rasāyanavidhiḥ sevyo vidhivatsusamāhitaiḥ//

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    rasāyanānāṃ saṃyogāḥ siddhā bhūtahitaiṣiṇā/
    nirdiṣṭāḥ prāṇakāmīye [Note: `sapta caivaṃ daśarṣiṇā' iti pā-.]saptatriṃśanmaharṣiṇā//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne rasāyanādhyāye prāṇakāmīyo nāma rasāyanapādo dvitīyaḥ//2//

    6.1.3.

    rasāyanādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ/

    athātaḥ karapracitīyaṃ rasāyanapādaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    karapracitānāṃ yathoktaguṇānāmāmalakānāmuddhṛtāsthnāṃ śuṣkacūrṇitānāṃ punarmāghe phālgune vā māse triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ svarasaparipītānāṃ punaḥ śuṣkacūrṇīkṛtānāmāḍhakamekaṃ grāhayet, atha jīvanīyānāṃ bṛṃhaṇīyānāṃ stanyajananānāṃ śukajananānāṃ vayaḥsthāpanānāṃ [Note: `ṣaḍvirecanaśatīyoktānāṃ' iti pā-.]ṣaḍvirecanaśatāśritīyoktānāmauṣadhagaṇānāṃ candanāgurudhavatiniśakhadiraśiṃśapāsanasārāṇāṃ [Note: `khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtānāṃ' iti pā-.]cāṇuśaḥ kṛttānāmabhayābibhītakapippalīvacācavyacitrakaviḍaṅgānāṃ ca samastānāmāḍhakamekaṃ daśaguṇenāmbhasā sādhayet, tasminnāḍhakāvaśeṣe rase supūte tānyāmalakacūrṇāni dattvā gomayāgnibhirvaṃśavidalaśaratejanāgnibhirvā sādhayedyāvadapanayādrasasya, tamanupadagdhamupahṛtyāyasīṣu pātrīṣvāstīrya śoṣayet, suśuṣkaṃ tat kṛṣṇājinasyopari dṛṣadi ślakṣṇapiṣṭamayaḥsthālyāṃ nidhāpayet samyak, taccūrṇamayaścūrṇāṣṭabhāgasaṃprayuktaṃ madhusarpirbhyāmagnibalamabhisamīkṣya prayojayediti//

    bhavanti cātra---

    etadrasāyanaṃ pūrvaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo+aṅgirāḥ/
    jamadagnirbharadvājo bhṛguranye ca tadvidhāḥ//
    prayujya prayatā muktāḥ śramavyādhijarābhayāt/
    yāvadaicchaṃstapastepustatprabhāvānmahābalāḥ//
    idaṃ rasāyanaṃ cakre brahmā vārṣasahasrikam/
    jarāvyādhipraśamanaṃ buddhīndriyabalapradam//
    (ityāmalakāyasaṃ brāhmarasāyanam/)
    tapasā brahmacaryeṇa dhyānena praśamena ca/
    rasāyanavidhānena kālayuktena cāyuṣā//
    sthitā maharṣayaḥ pūrvaṃ, nahi kiñcidrasāyanam/
    grāmyānāmanyakāryāṇāṃ sidhyatyaprayatātmanām//
    saṃvatsaraṃ payovṛttirgavāṃ madhye vaset sadā/
    sāvitrīṃ manasā dhyāyan brahmacārī yatendriyaḥ//
    saṃvatsarānte paupīṃ vā māghīṃ vā phālgunīṃ tithim/
    tryahopavāsī śuklasya praviśyāmalakīvanam//
    bṛhatphalāḍhyamāruhya drumaṃ śākhāgataṃ phalam/
    gṛhītvā pāṇinā tiṣṭhejjapan brahmāmṛtāgamāt//
    tadā hyavaśyamamṛtaṃ vasatyāmalake kṣaṇam/
    śarkarāmadhukalpāni snehavanti mṛdūni ca//
    bhavantyamṛtasaṃyogāttāni yāvanti bhakṣayet/
    jīvedvarṣasahasrāṇi tāvantyāgatayauvanaḥ//
    sauhityameṣāṃ gatvā tu bhavatyamarasannibhaḥ/
    svayaṃ cāsyopatiṣṭhante śrīrvedā vāk ca rūpiṇī//
    (iti kevalāmalakarasāyanam/)
    triphalāyā rase mūtre gavāṃ kṣāre ca lāvaṇe/
    krameṇa ceṅgudīkṣāre kiṃśukakṣāra eva ca//
    tīkṣṇāyasasya patrāṇi vahnivarṇāni &sādhayet/
    caturaṅguladīrghāṇi &&tilotsedhatanūni ca//
    &`vāpayet' iti pā-. &&`tilotsedhasamāni' iti pā-.
    jñātvā tānyañjanābhāni sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet/
    tāni cūrṇāni madhunā rasenāmalakasya ca//
    yuktāni lehavat kumbhe sthitāni ghṛtabhāvite/
    saṃvatsaraṃ nidheyāni yavapalle tathaiva ca//
    dadyādāloḍanaṃ māse sarvatrāloḍayan budhaḥ/
    saṃvatsarātyaye tasya prayogo madhusarpiṣā//
    prātaḥ prātarvalāpekṣī sātmyaṃ jīrṇe ca bhojanam/
    eṣa eva ca lauhānāṃ prayogaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ//
    nābhighātairna cātaṅkairjarayā na ca mṛtyunā/
    sa dhṛṣyaḥ syādgajaprāṇaḥ sadā cātibalendriyaḥ//
    dhīmān yaśasvī &vāksiddhaḥ śrutadhārī &&mahādhanaḥ/
    bhavet samāṃ prayuñjāno naro lauharasāyanam//
    &`vāgmī ca' iti pā-. &&`mahābalaḥ' iti pā-.
    anenaiva vidhānena hemnaśca rajatasya ca/
    āyuḥprakarṣakṛtsiddhaḥ prayogaḥ sarvaroganut//
    (iti lauhādirasāyanam/)
    aindrī matsyākhyako brāhmī vacā brahmasuvarcalā/
    pippalyo lavaṇaṃ hema śaṅkhapuṣpī viṣaṃ ghṛtam//
    eṣāṃ triyavakān bhāgān hemasarpirviṣairvinā/
    dvau yavau tatra hemnastu tilaṃ dadyādviṣasya ca//
    sarpiṣaśca palaṃ dadyāttadaikadhyaṃ prayojayet/
    ghṛtaprabhūtaṃ sakṣaudraṃ jīrṇe cānnaṃ praśasyate//
    jarāvyādhipraśamanaṃ smṛtimedhākaraṃ param/
    āyuṣyaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ dhanyaṃ svaravarṇaprasādanam//
    paramojaskaraṃ caitat siddhamaindraṃ rasāyanam/
    nainat prasahate kṛtyā nālakṣmīrna viṣaṃ na ruk//
    śvitraṃ sakuṣṭhaṃ jaṭharāṇi gulmāḥ plīhā purāṇo viṣamajvaraśca/
    medhāsmṛtijñānaharāśca rogāḥ śāmyantyanenātibalāśca vātāḥ//
    (ityaindraṃ rasāyanam/)
    maṇḍūkaparṇyāḥ svarasaḥ prayojyaḥ kṣīreṇa yaṣṭīmadhukasya cūrṇam/
    raso guḍūcyāstu samūlapuṣpyāḥ kalkaḥ prayojyaḥ khalu śaṅkhapuṣpyāḥ//
    āyuḥpradānyāmayanāśanāni balāgnivarṇasvaravardhanāni/
    medhyāni caitāni rasāyanāni medhyā viśeṣeṇa ca śaṅkhapuṣpī//
    (iti medhyarasāyanāni/)
    pañcāṣṭau sapta daśa vā pippalīrmadhusarpiṣā/
    rasāyanaguṇānveṣī samāmekāṃ prayojayet//
    tisrastisrastu pūrvāhṇe bhuktvā+agre bhojanasya ca/
    pippalyaḥ kiṃśukakṣārabhāvitā ghṛtabharjitāḥ//
    prayojyā madhusaṃmiśrā rasāyanaguṇaiṣiṇā/
    jetuṃ kāsaṃ kṣayaṃ śoṣaṃ śvāsaṃ hikkāṃ galāmayān//
    arśāṃsi grahaṇīdoṣaṃ pāṇḍutāṃ viṣamajvaram/
    vaisvaryaṃ pīnasaṃ śophaṃ gulmaṃ vātabalāsakam//
    (iti pippalīrasāyanam/)
    kramavṛddhyā daśāhāni &daśapaippalikaṃ dinam/
    vardhayet payasā sārdhaṃ tathaivāpanayet punaḥ//
    &`daśapippalīkaṃ' iti pā-.
    jīrṇe jīrṇe ca bhuñjīta ṣaṣṭikaṃ kṣīrasarpiṣā/
    pippalīnāṃ sahasrasya prayogo+ayaṃ rasāyanam//
    piṣṭāstā balibhiḥ sevyāḥ, śṛtā madhyabalairnaraiḥ/
    &cūrṇīkṛtā hṛasvabalairyojyā doṣāmayān prati//
    &`śītīkṛtāḥ' iti pā-.
    daśapaippalikaḥ śreṣṭho madhyamaḥ &ṣaṭ prakīrtitaḥ/
    prayogo yastriparyantaḥ sa kanīyān sa cābalaiḥ//
    &`ṣaṭ ṣaṭpaipalikaḥ yogaḥ' iti yogīndranāthasenaḥ.
    bṛṃhaṇaṃ svaryamāyuṣyaṃ plīhodaravināśanam/
    vayasraḥ sthāpanaṃ medhyaṃ pippalīnāṃ rasāyanam//
    (iti &pippalīvardhamānaṃ rasāyanam/) &`vardamānapippalīrasāyanam' iti pā-.
    jaraṇānte+abhayāmekāṃ prāgbhuktād dve bibhītake/
    bhuktvā tu madhusarpirbhyāṃ catvāryāmalakāni ca//
    prayojayan samāmekāṃ triphalāyā rasāyanam/
    jīvedvarṣaśataṃ pūrṇamajaro+avyādhireva ca//
    (iti triphalārasāyanam/)
    traiphalenāyasīṃ pātrīṃ kalkenālepayennavām/
    tamahorātrikaṃ lepaṃ pibet kṣaudrodakāplutam//
    prabhūtasnehamaśanaṃ jīrṇe tatra praśasyate/
    ajaro+aruk samābhyāsājjīveccaiva samāḥ śatam//
    (iti triphalārasāyanamaparam/)
    madhukena tugākṣīryā pippalyā kṣaudrasarpiṣā/
    triphalā sitayā cāpi yuktā siddhaṃ rasāyanam//
    (iti triphalārasāyanamaparam/)
    &sarvalauhaiḥ suvarṇena vacayā madhusarpiṣā/
    viḍaṅgapippalībhyāṃ ca triphalā lavaṇena ca//
    &`savairlohaiḥ trapusīsatāmrarūpyakṛṣṇalohaiḥ' iti yogīndranāthasena.
    saṃvatsaraprayogeṇa medhāsmṛtibalapradā/
    bhavatyāyuḥpradā dhanyā jarāroganibarhaṇī//
    (iti triphalārasāyanamaparam/)
    anamlaṃ ca kaṣāyaṃ ca kaṭu pāke śilājatu/
    nātyuṣṇaśītaṃ dhātubhyaścaturbhyastasya saṃbhavaḥ//
    hemnaśca rajatāttāmrād-&varāt kṛṣṇāyasādapi/
    rasāyanaṃ tadvidhibhistadvṛṣyaṃ tacca roganut//
    &`varaṃ' iti pā-.
    vātapittakaphaghnaiśca niryūhaistat subhāvitam/
    vīryotkarṣaṃ paraṃ yāti sarvairekaikaśo+api vā//
    &prakṣiptoddhṛtamapyenat punastat prakṣipedrase/
    koṣṇe saptāhametena vidhinā tasya bhāvanā//
    &`śitlājatu koṣṇe vātaharādikvāthe prakṣipya athainaṃ raudre śoṣayet/
    pītatatkvāthamuddhṛtaṃ punarapi tad rase kvāthe prakṣipet/
    anena vidhinā saptāhaṃ (saptavārān) tasya bhāvanā' iti gaṅgādharaḥ.
    pūrvoktena vidhānena lohaiścūrṇīkṛtaiḥ saha/
    tat pītaṃ payasā dadyāddīrghamāyuḥ sukhānvitam//
    jarāvyādhipraśamanaṃ dehadārḍhya karaṃ param/
    medhāsmṛtikaraṃ dhanyaṃ kṣīrāśī tat prayojayet//
    prayogaḥ saptasaptāhāstrayaścaikaśca saptakaḥ/
    nirdiṣṭastrividhastasya paro madhyo+avarastathā//
    palamardhapalaṃ karṣo mātrā tasya tridhā matā/
    jāterviśeṣaṃ savidhiṃ tasya vakṣyāmyataḥ param//
    hemādyāḥ sūryasaṃtaptāḥ sravanti giridhātavaḥ/
    jatvābhaṃ mṛdu mṛtsnācchaṃ yanmalaṃ tacchilājatu//
    madhuraśca satiktaśca japāpuṣpanibhaśca yaḥ/
    kaṭurvipāke śītaśca sa suvarṇasya nisravaḥ//
    rūpyasya kaṭukaḥ śvetaḥ śītaḥ svādu vipacyate/
    tāmrasya barhikaṇṭhābhastiktoṣṇaḥ pacyate kaṭu//
    yastu guggulukābhāsastiktako lavaṇānvitaḥ/
    kaṭurvipāke śītaśca sarvaśreṣṭhaḥ sa cāyasaḥ//
    gomūtragandhayaḥ sarve sarvakarmasu yaugikāḥ/
    rasāyanaprayogeṣu paścimastu viśiṣyate//
    yathākramaṃ vātapitte śleṣmapitte kaphe triṣu/
    viśeṣataḥ praśasyante malā hemādidhātujāḥ//
    śilājatuprayogeṣu vidāhīni gurūṇi ca/
    varjayet sarvakālaṃ tu &kulatthān parivarjayet//
    &`kunakhān' iti pā-.
    te hyatyantaviruddhatvādaśmano bhedanāḥ param/
    loke dṛṣṭāstatasteṣāṃ prayogaḥ pratiṣidhyate//
    payāṃsi &takrāṇi rasāḥ sayūṣāstoyaṃ samūtrā vividhāḥ kaṣāyāḥ/
    āloḍanārthaṃ girijasya śastāste te prayojyāḥ prasamīkṣya kāryam//
    &`śuktāni' iti pā.
    na so+asti rogo bhuvi sādhyarūpaḥ śilāhvayaṃ yaṃ na jayet prasahya/
    tat kālayogairvidhibhiḥ prayuktaṃ svasthasya corjāṃ vipulāṃ dadāti//

    (iti śilājaturasāyanam/)

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    karapracitike pāde daśa ṣaṭ ca maharṣiṇā/
    rasāyanānāṃ siddhānāṃ saṃyogāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ//

    ityagvineśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne rasāyanādhyāye karapracitīyo nāma rasāyanapādastṛtīyaḥ//3//

    samāptaścāyaṃ rasāyanādhyāyaḥ//1//

    6.1.4.

    rasāyanādhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ/

    athāta āyurvedasamutthānīyaṃ rasāyanapādaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhāgavānātreyaḥ//

    ṛṣayaḥ khalu kadācicchālīnā &yāyāvarāśca grāmyauṣadhyāhārāḥ santaḥ sāṃpannikā mandaceṣṭā nātikalyāśca prāyeṇa babhūvuḥ/

    te sarvāsāmitikartavyatānāmasamarthāḥ santo grāmyavāsakṛtamātmadoṣaṃ matvā pūrvanivāsamapagatagrāmyadoṣaṃ śivaṃ puṇyamudāraṃ medhyamagamyamasukṛtibhirgaṅgāprabhavamamaragandharvakinnarānucaritamanekaratnanicayamacintyādbhutaprabhāvaṃ brāhmarṣiśiddhacāraṇānucaritaṃ divyatīrthauṣadhiprabhavamatiśaraṇyaṃ himavantamamarādhipatiguptaṃ jagmurbhṛgvaṅgiro+atrivasiṣṭhakaśyapāgastyapulastyavāmadevāsitagautamaprabhṛtayo maharṣayaḥ//

    &`śālāpraveśam arhantīti śālīnāḥ; gṛhaṃ nirmāya ekatra kṛtāvasthānāḥ/ yāyāvarāḥ punaḥ punar gamanaśīlāḥ/ arthādisaṃpattyā saṃpannā eva saṃpannikāḥ' iti yogīndranāthasenaḥ.

    tānindraḥ sahasradṛgamaragururabravīt---svāgataṃ brahmavidāṃ jñānatapodhanānāṃ brahmarṣīṇām/

    asti nanu vo glāniraprabhāvatvaṃa vaisvaryaṃ vaivarṇyaṃ ca grāmyavāsakṛtamasukhamasukhānubandhaṃ ca; grāmyo hi vāso mūlamaśastānāṃ, tat kṛtaḥ puṇyakṛdbhiranugrahaḥ prajānāṃ, svaśarīramavekṣituṃ &kālaḥ kālaścāyamāyurvedopadeśasya brahmarṣīṇām; ātmanaḥ prajānāṃ cānugrahārthamāyurvedamaśvinau mahyaṃ prāyacchatāṃ, prajāpatiraśvibhyāṃ, prajāpatye brahmā, prajānāmalpamāyurjarāvyādhibahulamasukhamasukhānubandhamalpatvādalpatapodamaniyamadānādhyayanasaṃcayaṃ matvā puṇyatamamāyuḥprakarṣakaraṃ jarāvyādhipraśamanamūrjaskaramamṛtaṃ śivaṃ śaraṇyamudāraṃ bhavanto mattaḥ śrotumarhatāthopadhārayituṃ prakāśayituṃ ca prajānugrahārthamārṣaṃ brahma ca prati maitrīṃ kāruṇyamātmanaścānuttamaṃ puṇyamudāraṃ brāhmamakṣayaṃ karmeti//

    &`svaśarīram arakṣibhiḥ kālaścāyaṃ' iti pā-.

    tacchrutvā vibudhapativacanamṛṣayaḥ sarva evamaravaramṛgbhistuṣṭuvuḥ, prahṛṣṭāśca tadvacanamabhinananduśceti//

    athendrastadāyurvedāmṛtamṛṣibhyaḥ saṃkramyovāca---etat sarvamanuṣṭheyam, ayaṃ ca śivaḥ kālo rasāyanānāṃ, divyāścauṣadhayo &himavatprabhavāḥ prāptavīryāḥ; tadyathā---aindrī, brāhmī, payasyā, kṣīrapuṣpī, śrāvaṇī, mahāśrāvaṇī, śatāvarī, vidārī, jīvantī, punarnavā, nāgabalā, sthirā, vacā, chatrā, aticchatrā, medā, mehāmedā, jīvanīyāścānyāḥ payasā prayuktāḥ ṣaṇmāsāt paramāyurvayaśca taruṇamanāmayatvaṃ svaravarṇasaṃpadamupacayaṃ medhāṃ smṛtimuttamabalamiṣṭāṃścāparān bhāvānāvahanti siddhāḥ//

    &`himavataḥ prabhāvāt' iti pā-. (itīndroktaṃ rasāyanam/)

    brahmasuvarcalā nāmauṣadhiryā hiraṇyakṣīrā puṣkarasadṛśapatrā, ādityaparṇī nāmauṣadhiryā 'sūryakāntā' iti vijñāyate suvarṇakṣīrā sūryamaṇḍalākārapuṣpā ca, nārīnāmauṣadhiḥ 'aśvabalā' iti vijñāyate yā &balvajasadṛśapatrā, kāṣṭhagodhā nāmauṣadhirgodhākārā, sarpānāmauṣadhiḥ sarpākārā, somo nāmauṣadhirājaḥ &&pañcadaśaparvā sa somo iva hīyate vardhate ca, padmā nāmauṣadhiḥ padmākārā padmaraktā padmagandhā ca, ajā nāmauṣadhiḥ 'ajaśṛṅgī' iti vijñāyate, nīlā nāmauṣadhistu nīlakṣīrā nīlapuṣpā latāpratānabahuleti; āsāmoṣadhīnāṃ yāṃ yāmevopalabheta tasyāstasyāḥ svarasasya sauhityaṃ gatvā snehabhāvitāyāmārdrapalāśadroṇyāṃ sapidhānāyāṃ digvāsāḥ śayīta, tatra pralīyate, ṣaṇmāsena punaḥ saṃbhavati, tasyājaṃ payaḥ pratyavasthāpanaṃ; ṣaṇmāsena devatānukārī bhavati vayovarṇasvarākṛtibalaprabhābhiḥ, svayaṃ cāsya sarvavācogatāni prādurbhavanti, divyaṃ cāsya cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca bhavati, gatiryojanasahasraṃ, daśavarṣasahasrāṇyāyuranupadravaṃ ceti//

    &`punarajasadṛśapatrā' iti pā-. &&`pañcadaśaparṇaḥ' iti pā-.

    bhavanti cātra---

    divyānāmoṣadhīnāṃ yaḥ prabhāvaḥ sa bhavadvidhaiḥ/
    śakyaḥ sodumaśakyastu syāt sodumakṛtātmabhiḥ//
    auṣadhīnāṃ prabhāveṇa tiṣṭhatāṃ sve ca karmaṇi/
    bhavatāṃ vikhilaṃ śreyaḥ sarvamevopapatsyate//
    vānaprasthairgṛhasthaiśca prayatairniyatātmabhiḥ/
    śakyā auṣadhayo hyetāḥ sevituṃ viṣayābhijāḥ//
    &yāstu kṣetraguṇaisteṣāṃ madhyamena ca karmaṇā/
    mṛduvīryatarāstāsāṃ vidhirjñeyaḥ sa eva tu//
    &`tāstu' iti pā-.
    paryeṣṭuṃ tāḥ prayoktuṃ vā ye+asamarthāḥ sukhārthinaḥ/
    rasāyanavidhisteṣāmayamanyaḥ praśasyate//
    balyānāṃ jīvanīyānāṃ bṛṃhaṇīyāśca yā daśa/
    vayasaḥ sthāpanānāṃ ca khadirasyāsanasya ca//
    kharjūrāṇāṃ madhūkānāṃ mustānāmutpalasya ca/
    mṛdvīkānāṃ viḍaṅgānāṃ vacāyāścitrakasya ca//
    śatāvaryāḥ payasyāyāḥ pippalyā joṅgakasya ca/
    ṛddhyā nāgabalāyāśca dvāradāyā dhavasya ca//
    triphalākaṇṭakāryośca vidāryāścandanasya ca/
    ikṣūṇāṃ śaramūlānāṃ śrīparṇyāstiniśasya ca//
    rasāḥ prthak pṛthaggrāhyāḥ palāśakṣāra eva ca/
    eṣāṃ palonmitān bhāgān payo gavyaṃ caturguṇam//
    dve pātre tilatailasya dve ca gavyasya sarpiṣaḥ/
    tat sādhyaṃ sarvamekatra susiddhaṃ snehamuddharet//
    tatrāmalakacūrṇānāmāḍhakaṃ śatabhāvitam/
    svarasenaiva dātavyaṃ kṣaudrasyābhinavasya//
    śarkarācūrṇapātraṃ ca prasthamekaṃ pradāpayet/
    tugākṣīryāḥ sapippalyāḥ sthāpyaṃ saṃmūrcchitaṃ ca tat//
    sucaukṣe mārtike kumbhe māsārdhaṃ ghṛtabhāvite/
    mātrāmagnisamāṃ tasya tata ūrdhvaṃ prayojayet//
    hematāmrapravālānāmayasaḥ sphaṭikasya ca/
    muktāvaidūryaśaṅkhānāṃ cūrṇānāṃ rajatasya ca//
    prakṣipya ṣoḍaśīṃ mātrāṃ vihāyāyāsamaithunam/
    jīrṇe jīrṇe ca bhuñjīta ṣaṣṭikaṃ kṣīrasarpiṣā//
    sarvarogapraśamanaṃ vṛṣyamāyuṣyamuttamam/
    sattvasmṛtiśarīrāgnibuddhīndriyabalapradam//
    paramūrjaskaraṃ caiva varṇasvarakaraṃ tathā/
    viṣālakṣmīpraśamanaṃ sarvavācogatapradam//
    siddhārthatāṃ cābhinavaṃ vayaśca prajāpriyatvaṃ ca yaśaśca loke/
    prayojyamicchadbhiridaṃ yathāvadrasāyanaṃ brāhmamudāravīryam//
    (itīndroktarasāyanamaparam/)
    samarthānāmarogāṇāṃ dhīmatāṃ niyatātmanām/
    kṛṭīpraveśaḥ &kṣaṇināṃ paricchadavatāṃ hitaḥ//
    &`kṣamiṇāṃ' iti pā-.
    ato+anyathā tu ye teṣāṃ sauryamārutiko vidhiḥ/
    tayoḥ śreṣṭhataraḥ pūrvo vidhiḥ sa tu suduṣkaraḥ//
    rasāyanavidhibhraṃśājjāyeran vyādhayo yadi/
    yathāsvamauṣadhaṃ teṣāṃ kāryaṃ muktvā rasāyanam//
    satyavādinamakrodhaṃ nivṛttaṃ madyamaithunāt/
    ahiṃsakamanāyāsaṃ praśāntaṃ priyavādinam//
    japaśaucaparaṃ dhīraṃ dānanityaṃ tapasvinam/
    devagobrāhmaṇācāryaguruvṛddhārcane ratam//
    ānṛśaṃsyaparaṃ nityaṃ nityaṃ &karuṇavedinam/
    samajāgaraṇasvapnaṃ nityaṃ kṣīraghṛtāśinam//
    &`kāruṇyavedinam' iti pā-.
    deśakālapramāṇajñaṃ yuktijñamanahaṅkṛtam/
    śastācāramasaṃkīrṇamadhyātmapravaṇendriyam//
    upāsitāraṃ vṛddhānāmāstikānāṃ jitātmanām/
    dharmaśāstraparaṃ vidyānnaraṃ nityarasāyanam//
    guṇairetaiḥ samuditaiḥ prayuṅkte yo rasāyanam/
    rasāyanaguṇān sarvān yathoktān sa samaśnute//
    (ityācārarasāyanam/)
    yathāsthūlamanirvāhya doṣāñchārīramānasān/
    rasāyanaguṇairjanturyujyate na kadācana//
    yogā hyāyuḥprakarṣārthā jarāroganibarhaṇāḥ/
    manaḥśarīraśuddhānāṃ sidhyanti prayatātmanām//
    tadetanna bhavedvācyaṃ sarvameva hatātmasu/
    &arujebhyo+advijātibhyaḥ śuśrūṣā yeṣu nāsti ca//
    &`arajobhyaḥ' iti pā-.
    ye rasāyanasaṃyogā vṛṣyayogāśca ye matāḥ/
    yaccoṣadhaṃ vikārāṇāṃ sarvaṃ tadvaidyasaṃśrayam//
    prāṇācāryaṃ budhastasmāddhīmantaṃ vedapāragam/
    aśvināviva devendraḥ pūjayedatiśaktitaḥ//
    aśvinau devabhiṣajau yajñavāhāviti smṛtau/
    yajñasya hi śiraśchinnaṃ punastābhyāṃ samāhitam//
    praśīrṇā daśanāḥ pūṣṇo netre naṣṭe bhagasya ca/
    vajriṇaśca bhujastambhastābhyāmeva cikitsitaḥ//
    cikitsitaśca śītāṃśurgṛhīto rājayakṣmaṇā/
    somābhipatitaścandraḥ kṛtastābhyāṃ punaḥ sukhī//
    bhārgavaścyavanaḥ kāmī vṛddhaḥ san vikṛtiṃ gataḥ/
    vītavarṇasvaropetaḥ kṛtastābhyāṃ punaryuvā//
    etaiścānyaiśca bahubhiḥ karmabhirbhiṣaguttamau/
    babhūvaturbhṛśaṃ pūjyāvindrādīnāṃ mahātmanām//
    grahāḥ stotrāṇi mantrāṇi &tathā nānāhavīṃṣi ca/
    &&dhūmrāśca paśavastābhyāṃ prakalpyante dvijātibhiḥ//
    &`tathā+anyāni havīṃṣi ca' iti pā-. &&`dhūmāśca' iti pā-.
    prātaśca savane somaṃ śakro+aśvibhyāṃ sahāśnute/
    sautrāmaṇyāṃ ca bhagavānaśvibhyāṃ saha modate//
    indrāgnī cāśvinau caiva stūyante prāyaśo dvijaiḥ/
    stūyante vedavākyeṣu na tathā+anyā hi devatāḥ//
    ajarairamaraistāvadvibudhaiḥ sādhipairdhruvaiḥ/
    pūjyete prayatairevamaśvinau bhiṣajāviti//
    mṛtyuvyādhijarāvaśyairduḥkhaprāyaiḥ sukhārthibhiḥ/
    kiṃ punarbhiṣajo martyaiḥ syurnātiśaktitaḥ//
    śīlavānmatimān yukto &dvijātiḥ śāstrapāragaḥ/
    prāṇibhirguruvat pūjyaḥ prāṇācāryaḥ sa hi smṛtaḥ//
    &`trijātiḥ' iti pā-.
    vidyāsamāptau &bhiṣajo dvitīyā jātirucyate/
    aśnute vaidyaśabdaṃ hi na vaidyaḥ pūrvajanmanā//
    &`bhiṣjastṛtīyā' iti pā-.
    vidyāsamāptau brāhmaṃ vā sattvamārṣamathāpi vā/
    dhruvamāviśati &jñānāttasmadvaidyo dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ//
    &`jñānāttasmadvaidyastrijaḥ' iti pā-. `prathamā jātiḥ mātṛgarbhato janma, dvitīyā jātirupanayanāt, tṛtīyā tu vaidyavidyāsamāptau; ataḥ śāstrapārago vaidyaḥ vidyāsamāptilakṣaṇatṛtīyajanmanā trija ucyate' iti yogīndranāthasenaḥ.
    nābhidhyāyenna cākrośedahitaṃ na samācaret/
    prāṇācāryaṃ budhaḥ kaścidicchannāyuranitvaram//
    cikitsitastu &saṃśrutya yo vā+asaṃśrutya mānavaḥ/
    nopākaroti vaidyāya nāsti tasyeha niṣkṛtiḥ//
    &`yo mānavo vaidyena cikitsito rogamuktaḥ san vaidyaṃ saṃśrutya pratiśrutya pratijñāya asaṃtya vā nopākaroti dhanādikaṃ na dadāti iha loke paratrāpi ca tasya niṣkṛtiḥ nistāro nāsti' iti yogīndranāthasenaḥ.
    bhiṣagapyāturān sarvān svasutāniva yatnavān/
    ābādhebhyo hi saṃrakṣedicchan dharmamanuttamam//
    dharmārthaṃ &cārthakāmārthamāyurvedo maharṣibhiḥ/
    prakāśito dharmaparairicchadbhiḥ sthānamakṣaram//
    &`nārthakāmārthaṃ' iti pā-.
    nārthārthaṃ nāpi kāmārthamatha bhūtadayāṃ prati/
    vartate yaścikitsāyāṃ sa sarvamativartate//
    kurvate ye tu vṛttyarthaṃ cikitsāpaṇyavikrayam/
    te hitvā kāñcanaṃ rāśiṃ pāṃśurāśimupāsate//
    dāruṇaiḥ kṛṣyamāṇānāṃ gadairvaivasvatakṣayam/
    chittvā vaivasvatān pāśān jīvitaṃ yaḥ prayacchati//
    dharmārthadātā sadṛśastasya nehopalabhyate/
    na hi jīvitadānāddhi dānamanyadviśiṣyate//
    paro bhūtadayā dharma iti matvā cikitsayā/
    vartate yaḥ sa siddhārthaḥ sukhamatyantamaśnute//

    tatra ślokau---

    āyurvedasamutthānaṃ divyauṣadhividhiṃ śubham/
    amṛtālpāntaraguṇaṃ siddhaṃ ratnarasāyanam//
    siddhebhyo brahmacāribhyo yaduvācāmareśvaraḥ/
    āyurvedasamutthāne tat sarvaṃ saṃprakāśitam//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsitasthāne rasāyanādhyāye āyurvedasamutthānīyo nāma rasāyanapādaścaturthaḥ//4//

    samāptaścāyaṃ rasāyanādhyāyaḥ//1//

    6.2.

    dvitīyodhyāyaḥ/

    6.2.1.

    vājīkaraṇādhyāye prathamaḥ pādaḥ/

    athātaḥ saṃyogaśaramūlīyaṃ vājīkaraṇapādaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    vājīkaraṇamanvicchet puruṣo nityamātmavān/
    tadāyattau hi dharmārthau prītiśca yaśa eva ca//
    putrasyāyatanaṃ hyetadguṇāścaite sutāśrayāḥ/
    vājīkaraṇamagryaṃ ca kṣetraṃ strī yā praharṣiṇī//
    iṣṭā hyekaikaśo+apyarthā paraṃ prītikarā smṛtāḥ/
    kiṃ punaḥ strīśarīre ye saṅghātena pratiṣṭhitāḥ//
    (saṅghāto hīndriyārthānāṃ strīṣu nānyatra vidyate/)
    stryāśrayo hīndriyārtho yaḥ sa prītijanano+adhikam/
    strīṣu prītirviśeṣeṇa strīṣvapatyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam//
    dharmārthau strīṣu lakṣmīśca strīṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ/
    surūpā yauvanasthā yā lakṣaṇairyā vibhūṣitā//
    yā vaśyā śikṣitā yā ca sā strī vṛṣyatamā matā/
    nānābhaktyā tu lokasya daivayogācca yoṣitām//
    taṃ taṃ prāpya vivardhante naraṃ rūpādayo guṇāḥ/
    vayorūpavacohāvairyā yasya paramāṅganā//
    praviśatyāśu hṛdayaṃ daivādvā karmaṇo+api vā/
    hṛdayotsavarūpā yā yā samānamanaḥśayā//
    samānasattvā yā vaśyā yā yasya prīyate priyaiḥ/
    yā pāśabhūtā sarveṣāmindriyāṇāṃ parairguṇaiḥ//
    yayā viyukto nistrīkamaratirmanyate jagat/
    yasyā ṛte śarīraṃ nā dhatte śūnyamivendriyaiḥ//
    śokodvegāratibhayairyāṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhibhūyate/
    yāti yāṃ prāpya visrambhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣyatyatīva yām//
    apūrvāmiva yāṃ yāti nityaṃ harṣātivegataḥ/
    gatvā garvā+api bahuśo yāṃ tṛptiṃ naiva gacchati//
    sā strī vṛṣyatamā tasya nānābhāvā hi mānavāḥ/
    atulyagotrāṃ vṛṣyāṃ ca prahṛṣṭāṃ nirupadravām//
    śuddhasnātāṃ vrajennārīmapatyārthī nirāmayaḥ/
    acchāyaścaikaśākhaśca niṣphalaśca yathā drumaḥ//
    aniṣṭagandhaścaikaśca nirapatyastathā naraḥ/
    citradīpaḥ saraḥ śuṣkamadhāturdhātusannibhaḥ//
    niṣprajastṛṇapūlīti mantavyaḥ puruṣākṛtiḥ/
    apratiṣṭhaśca nagnaśca śūnyaścaikendriyaśca nā//
    mantavyo niṣkriyaścaiva yasyāpatyaṃ na vidyate/
    bahumūrtirbahumukho bahuvyūho bahukriyaḥ//
    bahucakṣurbahujñāno bahvātmā ca bahuprajaḥ/
    maṅgalyo+ayaṃ praśasyo+ayaṃ dhanyo+ayaṃ vīryavānayam//
    bahuśākho+ayamiti ca stūyate nā bahuprajaḥ/
    prītirbalaṃ sukhaṃ vṛttirvistāro &vipulaṃ kulam//
    &`vibhavaḥ' iti pā-.
    yaśo lokāḥ sukhodarkāstuṣṭiścāpatyasaṃśritāḥ/
    tasmādapatyamanvicchan guṇāṃścāpatyasaṃśritān//
    vājīkaraṇanityaḥ syādicchan kāmasukhāni ca/
    upabhogasukhān siddhān vīryāpatyavivardhanān//
    vājīkaraṇasaṃyogān pravakṣyāmyata uttaram/
    śaramūlekṣumūlāni kāṇḍekṣuḥ sekṣuvālikā//
    śatāvarī payasyā ca vidārī kaṇṭakārikā/
    jīvantī jīvako medā vīrā carṣabhako balā//
    ṛddhirgokṣurakaṃ rāsnā sātmaguptā punarnavā/
    eṣāṃ tripalikān &bhāgān māṣāṇāmāḍhakaṃ navam//
    &`pṛtak tripalikān kṛtvā' iti pā-.
    vipācayejjaladroṇe caturbhāgaṃ ca śeṣayet/
    tatra peṣyāṇi madhukaṃ drākṣā phalgūni pippalī//
    ātmaguptā madhūkāni kharjūrāṇi śatāvarī/
    vidāryāmalakekṣūṇāṃ rasasya ca pṛthak pṛthak//
    sarpiṣaścāḍhakaṃ dadyāt kṣīradroṇaṃ ca tadbhiṣak/
    sādhayedghṛtaśeṣaṃ ca supūtaṃ yojayet punaḥ//
    śarkarāyāstugākṣīryāścūrṇaiḥ prasthonmataiḥ pṛthak/
    palaiścaturbhirmāgadhyāḥ palena maricasya ca//
    tvagelākeśarāṇāṃ ca cūrṇairardhapalonmitaiḥ/
    madhunaḥ kuḍavābhyāṃ ca dvābhyāṃ tatkārayedbhiṣak//
    palikā &gulikāstyānāstā yathāgni prayojayet/
    eṣa vṛṣyaḥ paraṃ yogo bṛṃhaṇo balavardhanaḥ//
    &`kṛtvā' iti pā.
    anenāśva ivodīrṇo balī liṅgaṃ samarpayet/
    (iti vṛṃhaṇīguṭikā/) māṣāṇāmātmaguptāyā bījānāmāḍhakaṃ navam//
    jīvakarṣabhakau vīrāṃ medāmṛddhiṃ śatāvarīm/
    madhukaṃ cāśvagandhāṃ ca sādhayet kuḍavonmitām//
    rase tasmin ghṛtaprasthaṃ gavyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ payaḥ/
    vidārīṇāṃ rasaprasthaṃ prasthamikṣurasasya ca//
    dattvā mṛdvagninā sādhyaṃ siddhaṃ sarpirnidhāpayet/
    śarkarāyāstugākṣīryāḥ kṣaudrasya ca pṛthak pṛthak//
    bhāgāṃścatuṣpalāṃstatra pippalyāścāvapet palam/
    palaṃ pūrvamato līḍhvā tato+annamupayojayet//
    ya icchedakṣayaṃ śukraṃ śephasaścottamaṃ balam/
    (iti vājīkaraṇaṃ ghṛtam/) śarkarā māṣavidalāstugākṣīrī payo ghṛtam//
    godhūmacūrṇaṣaṣṭhāni sarpiṣyutkārikāṃ pacet/
    tāṃ nātipakvāṃ mṛditāṃ kaukkuṭe madhure rase//
    sugandhe prakṣipeduṣṇe yathā sāndrībhavedrasaḥ/
    eṣa piṇḍdaraso vṛṣyaḥ pauṣṭiko balavardhanaḥ//
    anenāśva ivodīrṇo &balī liṅgaṃ samarpayet/
    śikhitittirihaṃsānāmevaṃ piṇḍaraso mataḥ/
    balavarṇasvarakaraḥ pumāṃstena vṛṣāyate//
    &`ivodīrṇabalaḥ' iti pā-. (iti &vājīkaraṇapiṇḍarasāḥ/) &`vājīkarī lapsikā' iti pā-.
    ghṛtaṃ māṣān sabastāṇḍān sādhayenmāhiṣe rase/
    bharjayettaṃ rasaṃ pūtaṃ phalāmlaṃ navasarpiṣi//
    īṣatsalavaṇaṃ yuktaṃ dhānyajīrakanāgaraiḥ/
    eṣa vṛṣyaśca balyaśca bṛṃhaṇaśca rasottamaḥ//
    (iti &vṛṣyamāhiṣarasaḥ/) &`vājīkarī lapsikā' iti pā-.
    caṭakāṃstittirirase tittirīn kaukkuṭe rase/
    kukkuṭān bārhiṇarase hāṃse bārhiṇameva ca//
    navasarpiṣi saṃtaptān phalāmlān kārayedrasān/
    madhurān vā yathāsātmyaṃ gandhāḍhyān balavardhanām//
    (ityanye vṛṣyarasāḥ/)
    tṛptiṃ caṭakamāṃsānāṃ gatvā yo+anupibet payaḥ/
    na tasya liṅgaśaithilyaṃ syānna śukrakṣayo niśi//
    (iti vṛṣyamāṃsam/)
    māṣayūṣeṇa yo bhuktvā ghṛtāḍhyaṃ ṣaṣṭikaudanam/
    payaḥ pibati rātriṃ sa kṛtsnāṃ jāgarti vegavān//
    (iti vṛṣyamāṣayogaḥ/)
    na nā svapiti rātriṣu &nityastabdhena śephasā/
    tṛptaḥ kukkuṭamāṃsānāṃ bhṛṣṭānāṃ nakraretasi//
    &`nistabdhena ca' iti pā-. (iti &vṛṣyaḥ kukkuṭamāṃsaprayogaḥ/) &`vṛṣyaśukrarasaḥ' iti pā-.
    niḥsrāvya matsyāṇḍarasaṃ bhṛṣṭaṃ sarpiṣi bhakṣayet/
    haṃsabarhiṇadakṣāṇāmevamaṇḍāni bhakṣayet//

    (iti vṛṣyo+aṇḍarasaḥ/)

    bhavataścātra---

    srotaḥsu śuddheṣvamale śarīre vṛṣyaṃ yadā [Note: `yadādyaṃ' iti pā-.] nā mitamatti kāle/
    vṛṣāyate tena paraṃ manuṣyastadbṛṃhaṇaṃ caiva balapradaṃ ca//
    tasmāt purā śodhanameva kāryaṃ balānurūpaṃ na hi vṛṣyayogāḥ/
    sidhyanti dehe maline prayuktāḥ [Note: `mliṣṭe' iti pā-.]kliṣṭe yathā vāsasi rāgayogāḥ//

    tatra ślokau---

    vājīkaraṇasāmarthyaṃ kṣetraṃ strī yasya caiva yā/
    ye doṣā nirapatyānāṃ guṇāḥ putravatāṃ ca ye//
    daśa pañca ca saṃyogā vīryāpatyavivardhanāḥ/
    uktāste śaramūlīye pāde puṣṭibalapradāḥ//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne vājīkaraṇādhyāye saṃyogaśaramūlīyo nāma vājīkaraṇapādaḥ prathamaḥ//1//

    6.2.2.

    vājīkaraṇādhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ/

    athāta āsiktakṣīrikaṃ vājīkaraṇapādaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    āsiktakṣīramāpūrṇamaśuṣkaṃ śuddhaṣaṣṭikam/
    &udūkhale samāpothya pīḍayet kṣīramarditam//
    &`kṣuṇṇaṃ vimarditaṃ kṣīre pīḍayet susamāhitaḥ' iti pā-.
    gṛhītvā taṃ rasaṃ pūtaṃ gavyena payasā saha/
    bījānāmātmaguptāyā dhānyamāṣarasena ca//
    balāyāḥ śūrpaparṇyośca jīvantyā jīvakasya &ca/
    ṛddhyarṣabhakakākolīśvadaṃṣṭrāmadhukasya ca//
    &`ṛṣabhasya ca kākolīmadhukānāṃ rasena ca' iti pā-.
    śatāvaryā vidāryāśca drākṣākharjūrayorapi/
    saṃyuktaṃ mātrayā vaidyaḥ sādhayettatra cāvapet//
    tugākṣīryāḥ samāṣāṇāṃ śālīnāṃ ṣaṣṭikasya ca/
    godhūmānāṃ ca cūrṇāni yaiḥ sa sāndrībhavedrasaḥ//
    sāndrībhūtaṃ ca kuryāt prabhūtamadhuśarkaram/
    guli(ṭi)kā badaraistulyāstāśca sarpiṣi bharjayet//
    tā yathāgni prayuñjānaḥ kṣīramāṃsarasāśanaḥ/
    paśyatyapatyaṃ vipulaṃ vṛddho+apyātmajamakṣayam//
    (ityapatyakarī ṣaṣṭikādiguṭikā/)
    caṭakānāṃ sahaṃsānāṃ dakṣāṇāṃ śikhināṃ tathā/
    śiśumārasya nakrasya bhiṣak śukrāṇi saṃharet//
    gavyaṃ sarpirvarāhasya kuliṅgasya vasāmapi/
    ṣaṣṭikānāṃ ca cūrṇāni cūrṇaṃ &godhūmakasya ca//
    &`gaudhūmikaṃ tathā' iti pā-.
    ebhiḥ pūpalikāḥ kāryāḥ śaṣkulyo vartikāstathā/
    pūpā dhānāśca vividhā bhakṣyāścānye pṛthagvidhāḥ//
    eṣāṃ prayogādbhsakṣyāṇāṃ stabdhenāpūrṇaretasā/
    śephasā vājivadyāti yāvadicchaṃ striyo naraḥ//
    (iti vṛṣyapūpalikādiyogāḥ/)
    ātmaguptāphalaṃ māṣān kharjūrāṇi śatāvarīm/
    śṛṅgāṭakāni mṛdvīkāṃ sādhayet prasṛtonmitam//
    kṣīraprasthaṃ jalaprasthametat prasthāvaśeṣitam/
    śuddhena vāsasā pūtaṃ yojayet prasṛtaistribhiḥ//
    śarkarāyāstugākṣīryāḥ sarpiṣo+abhinavasya ca/
    tat pāyayeta sakṣaudraṃ ṣaṣṭikānnaṃ ca bhojayet//
    jarāparīto+apyabalo yogenānena vindati/
    naro+apatyaṃ suvipulaṃ yuveva ca sa hṛṣyati//
    (ityapatyakaraḥ svarasaḥ/)
    kharjūrīmastakaṃ māṣān payasyāṃ ca śatāvarīm/
    kharjūrāṇi madhūkāni mṛdvīkāmajaḍāphalam//
    palonmitāni &matimān sādhayet salilāḍhake/
    tena pādāvaśeṣeṇa kṣīraprasthaṃ vipācayet//
    &`sarvāṇi' iti pā-.
    kṣīraśeṣeṇa tenādyād ghṛtāḍhyaṃ ṣaṣṭikaudanam/
    saśarkareṇa saṃyoga eṣa vṛṣyaḥ paraṃ smṛtaḥ//
    (iti vṛṣyakṣīram/)
    jīvakarṣabhakau medāṃ jīvantīṃ śrāvaṇīdvayam/
    kharjūraṃ ma dhukaṃ drākṣāṃ pippalīṃ viśvabheṣajam//
    śṛṅgāṭakaṃ vidārīṃ ca navaṃ sarpiḥ payo jalam/
    siddhaṃ ghṛtāvaśeṣaṃ taccharkarākṣaudrapādikam//
    ṣaṣṭikānnena saṃyuktamupayojyaṃ yathābalam/
    vṛṣyaṃ balyaṃ ca kaṇṭhyaṃ bṛṃhaṇamuttamam//
    (iti vṛṣyaghṛtam/)
    dadhnaḥ saraṃ śaraccandrasannibhaṃ doṣavarjitam/
    śarkarākṣaudramaricaistugākṣīryā ca buddhimān//
    yuktyā yuktaṃ sasūkṣmailaṃ nave &kumbhe śucau paṭe/
    mārjitaṃ prakṣipecchīte ghṛtāḍhye ṣaṣṭikaudane//
    &`kuṇḍe' iti pā-.
    pibenmātrāṃ rasālāyāstaṃ bhuktvā &ṣaṣṭikaudanam/
    varṇasvarabalopetaḥ pumāṃstena vṛṣāyate//
    &`tamadyādupariṣṭācca rasālāṃ mātrayā pibet' iti pā-. (vṛṣyo dadhisaraprayogaḥ/)
    candrāṃśukalpaṃ payasā ghṛtāḍhyaṃ ṣaṣṭikaudanam/
    śarkarāmadhusaṃyuktaṃ prayuñjāno vṛṣāyate//
    (iti vṛṣyaḥ ṣaṣṭikaudanaprayogaḥ/)
    tapte sarpiṣi nakrāṇḍaṃ tāmracūḍāṇḍamiśritam/
    yuktaṃ ṣaṣṭikacūrṇena sarpiṣā+abhinavena ca//
    paktvā pūpalikāḥ khādedvāruṇīmaṇḍapo naraḥ/
    ya icchedaśvavadgantuṃ prasektuṃ gajavacca yaḥ//
    (iti vṛṣyapūpalikāḥ/)
    bhavataścātra--- etaiḥ prayogairvidhivadvapuṣmān &vīryopapanno balavarṇayuktaḥ/
    harṣānvito vājivadaṣṭavarṣo bhavet samarthaśca varāṅganāsu//
    &`snehopapannaḥ' iti pā-.
    yadyacca kiñcinmanasaḥ priyaṃ syādramyā vanāntāḥ pulināni śailāḥ/
    iṣṭāḥ striyo bhūṣaṇagandhamālyaṃ priyā vayasyāśca tadatra &yogyam//
    &`yojyam' iti pā-.

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    āsiktakṣīrike pāde ye yogāḥ parikīrtitāḥ/
    aṣṭāvapatyakāmaiste prayojyāḥ pauruṣārthibhiḥ//

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne vājīkaraṇādhyāye āsiktakṣīriko nāma vājīkaraṇapādo dvitīyaḥ//2//

    6.2.3.

    vājīkaraṇādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ/

    athāto māṣaparṇabhṛtīyaṃ vājīkaraṇapādaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//
    māṣaparṇabhṛtāṃ dhenuṃ ghṛṣṭiṃ puṣṭāṃ catuḥstanīm/
    samānavarṇavatsāṃ ca jīvadvatsāṃ ca buddhimān//
    rohiṇīmathavā kṛṣṇāmūrdhvaśṛṅgīmadāruṇām/
    ikṣvādāmarjunādāṃ vā sāndrakṣīrāṃ ca dhārayet//
    kevalaṃ tu payastasyāḥ śṛtaṃ vā+aśṛtameva vā/
    śarkarākṣaudrasarpirbhiryuktaṃ tadvṛṣyamuttamam//
    śukralairjīvanīyaiśca bṛṃhaṇairbalavardhanaiḥ/
    kṣīrasaṃjanānaiścaiva payaḥ siddhaṃ pṛthak pṛthak//
    yuktaṃ godhūmacūrṇena saghṛtakṣaudraśarkaram/
    paryāyeṇa prayoktavyamicchatā śukramakṣayam//
    medāṃ payasyāṃ jīvantīṃ vidārīṃ kaṇṭakārikām/
    śvadaṃṣṭāṃ kṣīrikāṃ māṣān godhūmāñchāliṣaṣṭikān//
    payasyardhodake &paktvā kārṣikānāḍhakonmite/
    vivarjayet payaḥśeṣaṃ tat pūtaṃ kṣaudrasarpiṣā//
    &`siddhān' iti pā-.
    yuktaṃ saśarkaraṃ pītvā vṛddhaḥ saptatiko+api vā/
    vipulaṃ labhate+apatyaṃ yuveva ca sa hṛṣyati//
    maṇḍalairjātarūpasya tasyā eva payaḥ śṛtam/
    apatyajananaṃ siddhaṃ saghṛtakṣaudraśarkaram//
    triṃśat supiṣṭāḥ pippalyaḥ prakuñce tailasarpiṣoḥ/
    bhṛṣṭāḥ saśarkarākṣaudrāḥ kṣīradhārāvadohitāḥ//
    pītvā yathābalaṃ cordhvaṃ ṣaṣṭikaṃ kṣīrasarpiṣā/
    bhuktvā na rātrimastabdhaṃ liṅgaṃ paśyati nā kṣarat//
    (iti vṛṣyaḥ pippalīyogaḥ/)
    śvadaṃṣṭrāyā vidāryāśca rase kṣīracaturguṇe/
    ghṛtāḍhyaḥ sādhito vṛṣyo māṣaṣaṣṭikapāyasaḥ//
    (iti vṛṣyapāyasayogaḥ/)
    phalānāṃ jīvanīyānāṃ snigdhānāṃ rucikāriṇām/
    kuḍavaścūrṇitānāṃ syāt svayaṅguptāphalasya ca//
    kuḍavaścaiva māṣāṇāṃ dvau dvau ca tilamudgayoḥ/
    godhūmaśālicūrṇānāṃ kuḍavaḥ kuḍavo bhavet//
    sarpiṣaḥ kuḍavaścaikastat sarvaṃ &kṣīramarditam/
    paktvā pūpalikāḥ khādedbahvyaḥ syuryasya yoṣitaḥ//
    &`sarpiṣaḥ kuḍavaścaiva kṣīreṇa mṛditaṃ ca tat' iti pā-. (iti vṛṣyapūpalikāḥ/)
    ghṛtaṃ śatāvarīgarbhaṃ kṣīre daśaguṇe pacet/
    śarkarāpippalīkṣaudrayuktaṃ tadvṛṣyamuttamam//
    (iti vṛṣyaṃ śatāvarīghṛtam/)
    karṣaṃ madhukacūrṇasya &ghṛtakṣaudrasamāṃśikam/
    prayuṅkte yaḥ &&payaścānu nityavegaḥ sa nā bhavet//
    &`ghṛtakṣaudrasamanvitam' iti pā-. &&`payo+anupānaṃ yo lihyāt' iti pā-. (iti vṛṣyamadhukayogaḥ/)
    ghṛtakṣīrāśano nirbhīrnirvyādhirnityago yuvā/
    saṅkalpapravaṇo nityaṃ naraḥ strīṣu vṛṣāyate//
    kṛtaikakṛtyāḥ siddhārthā ye cānyo+anyānuvartinaḥ/
    kalāsu kuśalāstulyāḥ sattvena vayasā ca ye//
    kulamāhātmyadākṣiṇyaśīlaśaucasamanvitāḥ/
    ye kāmanityā ye hṛṣṭā ye viśokā gatavyathāḥ//
    ye tulyaśīlā ye bhaktā ye priyā ye priyaṃvadāḥ/
    tairnaraḥ saha visrabdhaḥ suvayasyairvṛṣāyate//
    abhyaṅgotsādanasnānagandhamālyavibhūṣaṇaiḥ/
    gṛhaśayyāsanasukhairvāsobhirahataiḥ priyaiḥ//
    vihaṅgānāṃ rutairiṣṭaiḥ strīṇāṃ cābharaṇasvanaiḥ/
    saṃvāhanairvarastrīṇāmiṣṭānāṃ ca vṛṣāyate//
    mattadvirephācaritāḥ sapadmāḥ salilāśayāḥ/
    jātyutpalasugandhīni śītagarbhagṛhāṇi ca//
    nadyaḥ phenottarīyāśca girayo nīlasānavaḥ/
    unnatirnīlameghānāṃ, ramyacandrodayā niśāḥ//
    vāyavaḥ sukhasaṃsparśāḥ kumudākaragandhinaḥ/
    ratibhogakṣamā &rātryaḥ saṅkocāguruvallabhāḥ//
    &`nāryaḥ' iti pā-.
    sukhāḥ sahāyāḥ parapuṣṭaghuṣṭāḥ phullā vanāntā viśadānnapānāḥ/
    gāndharvaśabdāśca sugandhayogāḥ sattvaṃ viśālaṃ nirupadravaṃ ca//
    siddhārthatā cābhinavaśca kāmaḥ strī cāyudhaṃ sarvamihātmajasya/
    vayo navaṃ jātamadaśca kālo harṣasya yoniḥ paramā narāṇām//

    tatra ślokaḥ---

    praharṣayonayo yogā vyākhyātā daśa pañca ca/
    māṣaparṇabhṛtīye+asmin pāde &śukrabalapradāḥ//
    &`puṣṭibalapradāḥ' iti pā-.

    ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne vājīkaraṇādhyāye māṣaparṇabhṛtīyo nāma vājīkaraṇapādastṛtīyaḥ//3//

    6.2.4.

    vājīkaraṇādhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ/

    athātaḥ pumāñjātabalādikaṃ vājīkaraṇapādaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

    iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

    pumān yathā jātabalo yāvadicchaṃ striyo vrajet/
    yathā cāpatyavān sadyo bhavettadupadekṣyate//
    na hi jātabalāḥ sarve narāścāpatyabhāginaḥ/
    bṛhaccharīrā balinaḥ santi nārīṣu durbalāḥ//
    santi &cālpāśrayāḥ strīṣu balavanto bahuprajāḥ/
